35.4: Ka kyerɛ wɔn a wɔn koma atu no se,“Monhyɛ mo ho den, na munnsuro;mo Nyankopɔn bɛba,ɔde aweretɔ bɛba;ananmuhyɛ a efi ɔsorobɛba abegye mo nkwa.”
35.5: Ɛno na wobebue anifuraefo ani,na wɔama asotifo aso ate asɛm.
35.6: Ɛno na mpakye behuruw te sɛ ɔforote,na mum tɛkrɛma de anigye ateɛ mu.Nsu betue wɔ sare so,na nsuwansuwa apue wɔ nweatam so.
35.7: Nwea a so yɛ hyew no bɛdan ɔtare,na nsuwansuwa atue wɔ asase wosee so.Atu a anka sakraman te mu no,ɛhɔ na sare ne demmire ne paparɔso befifi.
35.8: Na ɔtempɔn bɛda hɔ;wɔbɛfrɛ no Ahotefo Kwan.Wɔn a wɔn ho ntew rentu kwan wɔ so;ɛbɛda hɔ ama wɔn a wɔnantew saa Kwan no so;amumɔyɛfo nkwaseafo rennantenantew so.
35.9: Gyata biara rentena hɔ,na akekaboa biara rensi so;wɔrenhu wɔn wɔ hɔ.Na wɔn a wɔagye wɔn nko ara na wɔbɛfa so,
35.10: na wɔn a Awurade agye wɔn no bɛsan aba.Wɔde nnwonto bɛhyɛn Sion;anigye a ɛnsa da bɛyɛ wɔn ahenkyɛw.Wobenya anigye ne ahosɛpɛw mmoroso,na awerɛhow ne apinisi beguan akɔ.

36.1: Sanaherib Hunahuna YerusalemƆhene Hesekia adedi mfe dunan so no, Asiriahene Sanaherib bɛtow hyɛɛ Yuda nkuropɔn a wɔabɔ ho ban no so dii so.
36.2: Afei Asiriahene somaa nʼananmusifo fi Lakis a asraafo dɔm kɛse ka ne ho kohyiaa Ɔhene Hesekia wɔ Yerusalem. Bere a ɔsahene begyinaa nsudorobɛn bi a efi Atifi Tare de kɔ Ntamahorofo Atenae hɔ no,
36.3: Hilkia babarima Eliakim a na ɔhwɛ ahemfi no ntotoe so; Sebna a na ɔyɛ ɔkyerɛwfo ne Asaf babarima Yoa a na ɔno nso yɛ ɔkyerɛwfo kohyiaa no.
36.4: Na ɔsahene no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Monka nkyerɛ Hesekia se,“ ‘Asɛm a otumfo, Asiriahene ka ni: Dɛn na wode wo ho to so a ɛma wugye wo ho di saa?
36.5: Woka se wowɔ akodi ho nyansa ne nʼahoɔden, nanso woka nsɛm hunu. Hena na ɔtaa wʼakyi a enti wotew mʼanim atua?
36.6: Hwɛ wʼani da Misraim so, demmire a emu abu a ɛte sɛ pema a wutweri a ɛbɛwɔ wo nsa mu apira wo no! Saa na Misraimhene Farao te ma wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to ne so no nyinaa.
36.7: Ebia wobɛka se, “Yɛde yɛn ho to Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn so!” Ɛnyɛ ɔno na ɔhene Hesekia atutu nʼabosonnan ne afɔremuka nyinaa, ahyɛ Yudafo sɛ wɔnsom wɔ afɔremuka a ɛwɔ Yerusalem ha nko ara so no?
36.8: “ ‘Mɛka asɛm bi akyerɛ wo! Me wura Asiriahene ne wo bɛyɛ nhyehyɛe bi. Sɛ wubenya apɔnkɔsotefo mpenu, afi wo asraafo mu a, ɔbɛma wɔn apɔnkɔ mpenu ama wɔatenatena wɔn so.
36.9: Na wʼasraafo ketewa sɛɛ yi, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na woaso dae, sɛ wubetumi ne me wura asraafo no mu fa bi a wɔyɛ mmerɛw no mpo adi asi. Minim sɛ wode wo ho ato Misraim nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔsotefo mmoa so.
36.10: Bio, wugye di sɛ, maba sɛ merebɛtow ahyɛ asase yi so asɛe no kwa a Awurade nsa nni mu? Awurade ankasa ka kyerɛɛ me se menkɔko ntia saa asase yi na mensɛe no.’ ”
36.11: Na Eliakim, Sebna ne Yoa ka kyerɛɛ ɔsahene no se, “Yɛsrɛ mo, monka Arameike kasa nkyerɛ mo asomfo, efisɛ, yɛte ase yiye. Monnka Hebri na nnipa a wɔwɔ ɔfasu no so no bɛte ase.”
36.12: Na Senaherib nanmusini no buae se, “Me wura pɛ sɛ obiara a ɔwɔ Yerusalem te saa asɛm yi, na ɛnyɛ mo nko. Ɔpɛ sɛ wɔte sɛ, sɛ moamma mo nsa so a, wobetua kuropɔn yi. Ɔkɔm ne osukɔm werɛmfo bɛde nkurɔfo no ara kosi sɛ, wobedi wɔn ara agyanan, anom wɔn dwonsɔ.”
36.13: Afei ɔsahene no sɔre gyina kasaa wɔ Hebri mu se, “Muntie saa nkra yi a efi ɔhempɔn, Asiriahene nkyɛn no!
36.14: Sɛnea ɔhene no se ni: Mommma Hesekia nnaadaa mo. Ɔrentumi nnye mo!
36.15: Mommma Hesekia mfa saa asɛm a ɔkae se, ‘Awurade begye yɛn! Wɔremfa saa kurow yi mma Asiriahene’ no mma mo tirim nyɛ mo dɛ.
36.16: “Munntie Hesekia. Nea Asiriahene ka ni: Mo ne me nyɛ asomdwoe nhyehyɛe na mommra me nkyɛn. Na afei, mɛma mo mu biara adi ɔno ankasa bobe ne borɔdɔma na woanom nsu afi ɔno ankasa abura mu,
36.17: kosi sɛ mɛba abɛfa mo akɔ asase a ɛte sɛ mo de yi so, awi ne nsa foforo asase, aduan ne bobe mfuw asase.
36.18: “Mommma Hesekia nka se, ‘Awurade begye yɛn,’ mfa nnaadaa mo. Ɔman bi so nyame atumi agye ne man afi Asiriahene nsam pɛn ana?
36.19: Ɛhe na Hamat ne Arpad anyame no wɔ? Na Sefarwaim anyame no nso wɔ he? Wɔagye Samaria afi me nsam ana?
36.20: Ɔman bɛn so nyame na watumi agye ne manfo afi me tumi ase? Na afei ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na Awurade betumi agye Yerusalem afi me nsam.”
36.21: Na nnipa no yɛɛ komm a wɔamma mmuae biara, efisɛ na Hesekia aka akyerɛ wɔn se wɔnnkasa.
36.22: Afei Hilkia babarima Eliakim a na ɔhwɛ ahemfi no ntotoe so, Sebna a na ɔyɛ ɔkyerɛwfo ne Asaf babarima Yoa a ɔno nso yɛ ɔkyerɛwfo kɔɔ Hesekia nkyɛn a wɔasunsuane wɔn ntade mu, kɔkaa nea ɔsahene no aka akyerɛ no no.

37.1: Wɔhyɛ Yerusalem Gye Ho NkɔmBere a ɔhene Hesekia tee eyinom no, osunsuan ne ntade mu, na ofuraa atweaatam, na ɔkɔɔ Awurade asɔredan mu.
37.2: Na ɔsomaa Eliakim a ɔhwɛ ahemfi ntotoe so, Sebna, a ɔyɛ ɔkyerɛwfo ne asɔfo akunini a wɔn nyinaa furafura atweaatam, kɔɔ Amos babarima Odiyifo Yesaia nkyɛn.
37.3: Wɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Sɛnea ɔhene Hesekia ka ni: Saa da yi yɛ ɔhaw, animka ne animguase da. Ayɛ te sɛ nea mmofra awo du so, na ahoɔden a wɔde bɛwo wɔn nni hɔ.
37.4: Nanso ebia Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn ate sɛ Asiria nanmusini no regu Onyankopɔn teasefo no anim ase, na wɔbɛtwe nʼaso wɔ ne nsɛnkeka no ho. Enti bɔ mpae ma yɛn a yɛaka no!”
37.5: Bere a Ɔhene Hesekia mpanyimfo no de ɔhene no nkra brɛɛ Yesaia no,
37.6: Yesaia ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Ka kyerɛ wo wura se, ‘Sɛnea Awurade se ni: Mma abususɛm a Asiriahene asomafo no ka tiaa me no nhaw wo.
37.7: Muntie! Mede honhom bi rebɛhyɛ ne mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a sɛ ɔte asɛm bi a ɔbɛsan akɔ ne man mu na hɔ na mɛma wɔde afoa akum no.’ ”
37.8: Bere a ɔsahene no tee sɛ Asiriahene afi Lakis no, ɔsan nʼakyi kohuu sɛ ɔhene no ne Libna reko.
37.9: Ankyɛ, ɔhene Sanaherib nyaa nkra se, Tirhaka Etiopiani a ɔyɛ Misraimhene di asraafo anim rebɛko atia no. Bere a ɔtee no, ɔsomaa abɔfo kɔɔ Hesekia nkyɛn de nkra kɔmaa no se,
37.10: “Monka nkyerɛ Yudahene Hesekia se: Mma onyame a wode wo ho ato no so no nnaadaa mo nka se, ‘Wɔremfa Yerusalem mma Asiriahene.’
37.11: Moate nea Asiria ahemfo ayɛ amanaman no nyinaa. Wɔasɛe wɔn pasaa. Na mo de, wobegye mo ana?
37.12: Anyame a wɔwɔ aman a me nenanom sɛee wɔn no, aman te sɛ, Gosan, Haran, Resef ne Edenfo a na wɔwɔ Talasar no anyame gyee wɔn ana?
37.13: Nsɛm bɛn na ɛtotoo Hamathene ne Arpadhene? Nsɛm bɛn nso na ɛtotoo Sefarwaim, Hena ne Iwa ahemfo?”
37.14: Hesekia MpaebɔHesekia nsa kaa krataa a abɔfo no de bae no, ɔkenkanee. Afei ɔforo kɔɔ Awurade asɔredan no mu kɔtrɛw mu wɔ Awurade anim.
37.15: Na Hesekia bɔɔ mpae kyerɛɛ Awurade se,
37.16: “Asafo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn a wɔasi wo hene wɔ Kerubim ntam. Wo nko ara na woyɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ asase so ahenni nyinaa so. Wo na wobɔɔ ɔsoro ne asase.
37.17: Brɛ wʼaso ase, Awurade, na tie! Bue wʼani, Awurade, na hwɛ. Tie nsɛm a Sanaherib asoma de abɛsopa Onyankopɔn teasefo no.
37.18: “Awurade, ɛyɛ nokware sɛ Asiria ahemfo asɛe aman yi nyinaa, sɛnea nkra no ka no.
37.19: Na wɔatow anyame a wɔwɔ saa aman yi so no agu gya mu, ahyew wɔn, efisɛ wɔnyɛ anyame, na mmom wɔyɛ nnua ne abo a nnipa de wɔn nsa ayɛ.
37.20: Afei Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn, gye yɛn fi ne nsam, na ama ahenni a ɛwɔ asase so nyinaa ahu sɛ, wo nko ara, Awurade, ne Onyankopɔn.”
37.21: Sanaherib AsehweNa Amos babarima Yesaia de saa nkra yi kɔmaa Hesekia se, “Sɛɛ na Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn se: Esiane sɛ woabɔ me mpae afa Asiriahene Sanaherib ho nti,
37.22: eyi ne asɛm a Awurade aka atia no:“Ɔbabeabun Sion sopa wo,na ɔserew wo.Ɔbabea Yerusalem di wo ho fɛw,na ɔwosow ne ti bere a woreguan.
37.23: Hena na wugye di sɛ woyeyaw no, di ne ho fɛw nso?Hena na womaa wo nne so tiaa nona wohwɛɛ no ahantan so?Ɛyɛ Israel ɔkronkronni no!
37.24: Wonam wʼasomafo soadi Awurade ho fɛw.Na woaka se,‘Me nteaseɛnam dodow ntimaforo mmepɔw atenten.Yiw Lebanon mmepɔw a ɛwoware pa ara no.Matwitwa ne sida atenten no,ne nʼapepaw a ɛyɛ fɛ no agu fam.Madu ne mmepɔw a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri no so,ne ne kwaeberentuw mu.
37.25: Matutu mmura wɔ ahɔho nsase bebree sode ne nsu pa no adwudwo me ho.Mpo, mepaee Misraim nsubɔnten musɛnea mʼakofo betumi atwa!’
37.26: “Na Montee ɛ?Bere tenten a atwam, na mehyɛ too hɔ.Bere bi a atwam no na medwenee ho;afei mama aba mu sɛ,moadan ɔman a mosɛe nkuropɔn a wɔabɔho ban.
37.27: Wɔn nkurɔfo a tumi afi wɔn nsa noho adwiriw wɔn, na animguase aka wɔn.Wɔte sɛ afuw so nnua,ne afifide foforo a ɛyɛ mmrɛw.Wɔte sɛ sare a efifi ɔdan atifia ɛhyew ansa na anyin.
37.28: “Nanso minim nea wotebere a woba ne bere a wokɔne sɛnea wo bo huru tia me.
37.29: Na esiane sɛ wo bo huru tia mena wʼahantan adu mʼasom nti,mede me darewa bɛhyɛ wo hwenem,na mede akwankyerɛ dade ahyɛ wʼanom,mɛma wo afa ɔkwan a wofaa so bae no soasan wʼakyi.
37.30: “Eyi na ɛbɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne ama wo, Hesekia:“Saa afe yi wubedi nea ɛno ankasa fifii.Afe a ɛto so abien no, wubedi nea efi mu ba.Nanso afe a ɛto so abiɛsa no de, wo ara dua na twa,yɛ bobe nturo na di so aba.
37.31: Bio, nkae bi a ofi Yuda fibegye ntin wɔ fam na wasow aba wɔ soro.
37.32: Na nkae bi befi Yerusalem aba,na nkae dɔm afi Bepɔw Sion so.Asafo Awurade pɛ mu na eyi bɛyɛ.
37.33: “Eyi ne asɛm a Awurade ka fa Asiriahene ho:“Ɔrenhyɛn saa kuropɔn yi muna ɔrentow bɛmma wɔ ha.Ɔremfa nkatabo mmegyina kuropɔn no akyina ɔrensi pie ntua nʼano.
37.34: Ɔhene no kwan a ɔfaa so bae no ara so na ɔbɛsan afa akɔ nʼankasa man mu.”Awurade ka se,“Ɔrenwura saa kurow yi mu.
37.35: Esiane mʼankasa mʼanuonyam ne mʼakoa Dawid nti,mɛbɔ ho ban.”
37.36: Afei Awurade bɔfo fii adi na okunkum asraafo mpem ɔha aduɔwɔtwe anum wɔ Asiria nsraban mu. Bere a nnipa no sɔree anɔpa no, wohuu sɛ amu gugu baabiara!
37.37: Enti Asiriahene Sanaherib pɔn nʼakofo. Ɔsan kɔɔ Ninewe kɔtenaa hɔ.
37.38: Da bi a na ɔresɔre ne nyame Nisrok wɔ abosonnan mu no, ne mma mmarima baanu, Adramelek ne Sareser de afoa kokum no, na woguan kɔɔ Ararat asase so. Na ne babarima Esarhadon bedii nʼade sɛ Asiriahene.

38.1: Hesekia YareSaa nna no mu no, Hesekia yaree owuyare, na Amos babarima Odiyifo Yesaia kɔɔ ne nkyɛn kɔkae se, “Sɛnea Awurade se ni: Toto wʼakwan yiye, efisɛ worebewu; na wo ho renyɛ wo den bio.”
38.2: Bere a Hesekia tee asɛm yi, otwaa nʼani hwɛɛ ɔfasu, bɔɔ Awurade mpae se,
38.3: “Kae, Awurade, sɛnea manantew wʼanim nokware mu na mede me koma ayɛ nea ɛfata wɔ wʼanim.” Na Hesekia suu bebree.
38.4: Na saa asɛm yi fii Awurade nkyɛn kɔɔ Yesaia hɔ se,
38.5: “San kɔ Hesekia nkyɛn, na kɔka kyerɛ no se, ‘Sɛɛ na Awurade, wʼagya Dawid Nyankopɔn, ka: Mate wo mpaebɔ no, na mahu wo nisu. Mede mfe dunum bɛka wo nkwanna ho.
38.6: Na megye wo ne kuropɔn yi afi Asiriahene nsam. Mɛbɔ kuropɔn yi ho ban.
38.7: “ ‘Na eyi ne nsɛnkyerɛnne a Awurade bɛyɛ de adi ho adanse sɛ, obedi ne bɔhyɛ so:
38.8: Mɛma owia ano sunsuma atwe akɔ nʼakyi anammɔn du wɔ Ahas antweri so.’ ” Ɛno nti, owiahyerɛn no kɔɔ nʼakyi anammɔn du.
38.9: Nea Yudahene Hesekia kyerɛw wɔ ne yare ne nʼayaresa akyi ni:
38.10: Mekae se, “Mʼasetena mu nnapa yi muɛsɛ sɛ mefa owu apon muna wogye me mfe a aka yi ana?”
38.11: Mekae se, “Merenhu Awurade Nyankopɔn bioAwurade a ɔwɔ ateasefo asase so.Merenhu adesamma bio,anaa merenka wɔn a wɔte wiase yi ho bio.
38.12: Wɔadwiriw me fi agu agye afi me nsam,te sɛ, oguanhwɛfo ntamadan.Matwa me nkwa so sɛnea ɔnwemfotwa me fi asadua so;awia ne anadwo wutwaa me nkwa so.
38.13: Mede ntoboase twɛn kosii ahemadakye,nanso wɔbobɔɔ me nnompe mu te sɛ gyata;awia ne anadwo wutwaa me nkwa so.
38.14: Misuu sɛ asomfena anaa asukɔnkɔn;mitwaa adwo sɛ, aborɔnoma a ɔredi awerɛhow.Mʼani yɛɛ siamoo bere a mehwɛɛ soro.Mewɔ ɔhaw mu, Awurade, bra bɛboa me!”
38.15: Na dɛn na metumi aka?Wakasa akyerɛ me, na ɔno ankasa na wayɛ eyi.Mede ahobrɛase bɛnantew mʼasetena nyinaa mume kra ahoyeraw yi nti.
38.16: Awurade, ɛnam saa nneɛma yi so na nnipa nya nkwana me honhom nso nya nkwa wɔ mu.Wode mʼakwahosan asan ama menam so ama manya nkwa.
38.17: Yiw, ɛyɛ me yiyeyɛ ntina mekɔɔ saa ahoyeraw yi mu.Wo dɔ nti, wode me sieina mankɔ ɔsɛe amoa mu;na wode me bɔne nyinaa akyɛ me.
38.18: Ɔda rentumi nkamfo wo;owu rentumi nto wo ayeyi nnwom;wɔn a wosian kɔ amoa mu norentumi nnya anidaso wɔ wo nokware mu bio.
38.19: Ateasefo nko na wobetumi akamfo wo,sɛnea mereyɛ nnɛ yi;agyanom ka wo nokwaredi ho asɛmkyerɛ wɔn mma.
38.20: Awurade begye me nkwa,na yɛde asanku bɛto nnwomyɛn nkwanna nyinaawɔ Awurade fi.
38.21: Na Yesaia kae se, “Momfa borɔdɔma nyɛ nku mfa nsra pɔmpɔ no so, na ne ho bɛtɔ no.”
38.22: Na Hesekia bisae se, “Dɛn nsɛnkyerɛnne na ɛbɛda no adi sɛ, mɛkɔ Awurade asɔredan mu?”

39.1: Asomafo A Wofi BabiloniaSaa bere no Merodak-Baladan a ɔyɛ Babiloniahene Baladan babarima soma ma wɔde krataa ne akyɛde kɔmaa Hesekia, efisɛ na wate sɛ wayare ama ne ho atɔ no.
39.2: Hesekia gyee asomafo no fɛw so, na afei ɔde nea ɔwɔ wɔ ne adekoradan mu kyerɛɛ wɔn; dwetɛ, sikakɔkɔɔ, nnuhuam, ngohuam, nʼakode akorae ne biribiara a ɛka nʼademude ho. Biribiara nni nʼahemfi ne nʼahenni mu a Hesekia amfa ankyerɛ wɔn.
39.3: Afei Odiyifo Yesaia kɔɔ ɔhene Hesekia nkyɛn, kobisaa no se, “Asɛm bɛn na saa mmarima no kae na he na wofi bae?”Hesekia buae se, “Wofi akyirikyiri asase bi so. Wofi Babilonia, na wɔbaa me nkyɛn.”
39.4: Odiyifo no bisae se, “Dɛn na wohuu wɔ wʼahemfi hɔ?”Hesekia buae se, “Wohuu biribiara a ɛwɔ mʼahemfi ha. Biribiara nni mʼademude mu a mamfa ankyerɛ wɔn.”
39.5: Afei Yesaia ka kyerɛɛ Hesekia se, “Tie asɛm a efi Asafo Awurade nkyɛn:
39.6: Nokware, bere bi bɛba a, wɔbɛsoa biribiara a ɛwɔ wʼahemfi ne agyapade a wʼagyanom akora de abedu nnɛ no akɔ Babilonia. Biribiara renka, sɛɛ na Awurade se.
39.7: Wʼankasa wʼasefo bi mpo, wɔbɛfa wɔn nnommum. Wɔbɛyɛ piamfo a wɔbɛsom wɔ Babiloniahene ahemfi.”
39.8: Na Hesekia ka kyerɛɛ Yesaia se, “Saa asɛm yi a efi Awurade nkyɛn a woaka akyerɛ me yi yɛ asɛm papa.” Nanso na ɔhene no redwene sɛ, ne bere so de, obenya asomdwoe ne bammɔ.

40.1: Onyankopɔn Nkurɔfo AwerɛkyekyeMonkyekye, monkyekye me nkurɔfo werɛ.Saa na mo Nyankopɔn se.
40.2: Monka asomdwoesɛm nkyerɛ Yerusalem,na mompae mu nka nkyerɛ no sene som dennen no aba awiei,wɔatua ne bɔne no so ka,na wɔanya ne bɔne nyinaa so akatua mmɔhoafi Awurade nsam.
40.3: Nne bi reteɛ mu se,“Munsiesie ɔkwan mma Awuradewɔ nweatam no so.Monteɛ ɔtempɔn wɔ sare no somma yɛn Nyankopɔn.
40.4: Obon biara bɛyɛ ma,bepɔw ne nkoko nyinaa bɛkɔ fam,asase a ɛyɛ abonkyiabonkyi no bɛyɛ tamaa,na mmeae a ɛyɛ akɔntɔnkye no ayɛ tataw.
40.5: Na Awurade anuonyam bɛda adi,na nnipa nyinaa behu.Efisɛ Awurade na waka!”
40.6: Nne bi kae se, “Teɛ mu.”Na mekae se, “Menteɛ mu nka dɛn?”“Nnipa nyinaa te sɛ sare,na wɔn anuonyam nyinaa te sɛ afuw so nhwiren.
40.7: Sare hyew, na nhwiren twintwamefisɛ Awurade ahomegu fa wɔn so.Nokware, nnipa no yɛ sare.
40.8: Sare hyew, na nhwiren twintwam,nanso yɛn Nyankopɔn asɛm no tim hɔ daa.”
40.9: Wo a wode asɛm pa reba Sion,foro kɔ bepɔw tenten bi so.Wo a wode asɛm pa reba Yerusalem,ma wo nne so na teɛ mu,ma so, nsuro;ka kyerɛ Yuda nkurow se,“Mo Nyankopɔn ni!”
40.10: Hwɛ, Asafo Awurade de tumi reba,na nʼabasa bedi hene ama no.Hwɛ, nʼakatua ka ne ho,na ɔde nʼabasobɔde nam.
40.11: Ɔhwɛ ne nguankuw sɛ oguanhwɛfo.Ɔboa nguantenmma no wɔ nʼabasa sooturu wɔn ne koko so;na nguan a wɔwɔ mma no, ɔka wɔn brɛoo.
40.12: Hena na wasusuw obon mu nsu wɔ ne nsamanaa ɔde ne nsateaa asusuw ɔsoro?Hena na ɔde asase so mfutuma agu kɛntɛn mu,anaa wakari mmepɔw wɔ nsania sone nkoko wɔ nsania apampaa so?
40.13: Hena na wate Awurade ase,anaa wakyerɛkyerɛ no sɛ ne fotufo?
40.14: Hena na Awurade abisa no sɛ ɔnkyerɛ no biribi ase,na hena na ɔkyerɛɛ no ɔkwan pa no?Hena na ɔmaa no nimdeɛanaa ɔkyerɛɛ no nhumu kwan?
40.15: Ampa ara aman no te sɛ nsu sope wɔ bokiti mu;wɔde wɔn toto mfutuma a egu nsania so ho;ɔkari nsupɔw te sɛnea ɛyɛ mfutuma muhumuhu.
40.16: Lebanon nnɔɔso mma afɔremuka so gya,na ne mmoa renso mma ɔhyew afɔrebɔde.
40.17: Aman nyinaa nsɛ hwee wɔ nʼanim;obu wɔn adehunu bia wɔnka hwee.
40.18: Afei hena ho na wode Onyankopɔn bɛtoto?Nsɛsode bɛn ho na wode no bɛto?
40.19: Ohoni de, odwumfo na ɔyɛ,na sikadwumfo de sikakɔkɔɔ agu hona wasiesie dwetɛ nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn ama no.
40.20: Ohiani a ɔrentumi mfa saa ayɛyɛde yi mma nokɔhwehwɛ dua a ɛremporɔw.Ɔhwehwɛ odwumfo nyansafona wayɛ ohoni a ɛremmunum nhwe fam asi hɔ.
40.21: Wunnim ana?Wontee ana?Wɔnnka nkyerɛɛ wo mfii mfiase no ana?Efi bere a wɔbɔɔ asase no, wontee ase ana?
40.22: Ɔte ahengua so wɔ asase dantaban no atifiɛso nnipa te sɛ tɛwtɛwɔtwe ɔsoro mu te sɛ bamkyinii,na ɔtrɛw mu sɛ ntamadan tena mu.
40.23: Ɔma ahemmea yɛ nnipahununa wiase yi sodifo nso, ɔbrɛ wɔn ase.
40.24: Wɔtɛw wɔn ara pɛ,woduaa wɔn ara pɛ,wogyee ntin wɔ asase mu pɛ,na wahome agu wɔn so ama wɔakisa,na mframa abɔ wɔn kɔ te sɛ ntɛtɛ.
40.25: “Hena ho na wode me bɛto?Anaasɛ hena na ɔne me sɛ?” Ɔkronkronni no na ose.
40.26: Momma mo ani so nhwɛ ɔsoro:Hena na ɔbɔɔ eyinom nyinaa?Nea oyiyi ɔsoro nsoromma mmaako mmaako,na ɔbɔ obiara din frɛ no.Nʼahoɔden ne ne tumi ntiwɔn mu baako mpo nyera.
40.27: Adɛn na wunwiinwii, Yakob,na woka se, Israel,“Mʼakwan ahintaw Awurade;na me Nyankopɔn abɔ mʼasɛm agu”?
40.28: Wunnim ana?Wontee ana?Awurade yɛ daapem Nyankopɔn,na ɔyɛ asase nyinaa yɛfo.Ɔremmrɛ na ɔrentɔ beraw,na ne nhumu nni nhwehwɛmu.
40.29: Ɔma nea watɔ beraw ahoɔdennea wayɛ mmerɛw nso, ɔto nʼahoɔden so.
40.30: Mpo, mmabun brɛ, na wɔtɔ beraw,na mmerante hintihintiw hwehwe ase;
40.31: Nanso, wɔn a wɔn ani da Awurade sobenya ahoɔden foforo.Wɔde ntaban sɛ akɔre de betu akɔ wim;wobetu mmirika, na wɔrentɔ beraw.Wɔbɛnantew, na wɔrentɔ piti.

41.1: Israel Boafo“Monyɛ komm wɔ mʼanim, mo nsupɔw!Ma aman no nhyɛ wɔn ho den!Ma wɔmmra ha mmɛkasa;momma yɛmmɔ mu nhyia wɔ asennii hɔ.
41.2: “Hena na wakanyan nea ofi apuei no,afrɛ no trenee mu sɛ ɔmmɛsom no?Ɔde aman hyɛ ne nsana ɔbrɛ ahemfo ase wɔ nʼanim.Ɔde nʼafoa ma wɔdan mfutuma,ɔde ne bɛmma ma wɔdan ntɛtɛ a mframa bɔ hwete.
41.3: Ɔtaa wɔn na ɔkɔ nʼanim a biribiara nti ne ho,wɔ kwan a ɔmfaa so da no so.
41.4: Hena na wayɛ eyi akosi awiei,afrɛ awo ntoatoaso afi mfiase?Me Awurade, meka adikanfone akyikafo ho, Mene ɔno ara.”
41.5: Nsupɔw no ahu na wɔbɔ hu;nsase ano ho popo.Wotwiw bɛn, na wɔba anim;
41.6: na obiara boa ne yɔnkona ɔka kyerɛ ne nua se, “Yɛ den!”
41.7: Odwumfo hyɛ sikadwumfo nkuran,na nea ɔde asae yɛ no trontromboa nea ɔbɔ atommo so.Ɔka fa nea ɔsɔw no ho se, “Eye pa ara.”Ɔbobɔ ohoni no mu nnadewa sɛnea ɛrentu nhwe fam.
41.8: “Nanso wo, Israel, me somfo,Yakob, nea mayi no no,mo, mʼadamfo Abraham asefo.
41.9: Mefaa wo fii nsase ano,fii nʼakyirikyiri ntwea so, na mefrɛɛ wo.Mekae se, ‘Woyɛ me somfo’;mapaw wo na mempoo wo ɛ.
41.10: Enti nsuro, na mene wo wɔ hɔ;mma wo werɛ nhow, na mene wo Nyankopɔn.Mɛhyɛ wo den, na mɛboa wo;mede me trenee nsa nifa bɛma wo so.
41.11: “Wɔn a wɔn bo afuw wo no nyinaa, ampa arawɔn ani bewu na wɔn anim agu ase;wɔn a wɔsɔre tia wo norensɛ hwee na wobewuwu.
41.12: Ɛwɔ mu sɛ wobɛhwehwɛ wʼatamfo de,nanso worenhu wɔn.Wɔn a wotu wo so sa norensɛ hwee koraa.
41.13: Na mene Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn,nea okura wo nsa nifa muna ɔka kyerɛ wo se, Nsuro;mɛboa wo.
41.14: Nsuro, osunson Yakob,Israel a wusua,na me ankasa mɛboa wo,” Awurade na ose,wo gyefo, Israel Ɔkronkronni no.
41.15: “Hwɛ, mede wo bɛyɛ nhuwso apa,a ɛyɛ amono, ano yɛ nnam na ɛwɔ ɛse bebree.Wubehuhuw mmepɔw no so na woadwiriw wɔn,na woama nkoko ayɛ sɛ ntɛtɛ.
41.16: Wubehuhuw wɔn so, mframa bɛma wɔn so,na ahum abɔ wɔn akɔ.Nanso wʼani begye wɔ Awurade muna woahyɛ Israel Ɔkronkronni no anuonyam.
41.17: “Ohiani ne mmɔborɔni kyin pɛ nsu,nanso bi nni hɔ;osukɔm ama wɔn tɛkrɛma so ayow.Nanso me Awurade, mɛma wɔn mmuae.Me, Israel Nyankopɔn, merennyaw wɔn.
41.18: Mɛma nsubɔnten ateɛ wɔ sorɔnsorɔmmea a awu no so,na nsuti apue wɔ abon mu.Mɛdan nweatam ayɛ no mmura,na nsase a awo adan nsuti bebree.
41.19: Meduadua wɔ nweatam so,sida, ɔkanto, ohuam ne ngonnua.Meduadua ɔpepaw wɔ asase wosee soasɛsɛ ne kwabɔhɔre abɔ mu,
41.20: sɛnea nnipa behu na wɔate,na wɔasusuw ho na wɔate ase sɛ,Awurade nsa na ayɛ saa ade yi,Israel ɔkronkronni no na ɔma ɛbae.
41.21: “Bɔ wo nkuro,” Awurade na ose.“Kyerɛkyerɛ wʼasɛm mu,” Yakob Hene na ose.
41.22: “Fa wʼahoni no brana wɔmmɛka nea ebesi nkyerɛ yɛn.Wɔmmɛka sɛnea na kan nneɛma no te nkyerɛ yɛn,sɛnea yebedwen ho afana yɛahu nea ebefi mu aba.Anaasɛ wɔmpae mu nka nneɛma a ebesi nkyerɛ yɛn.
41.23: Monka yɛn nea ebesi daakye,na ama yɛahu sɛ moyɛ anyame.Monyɛ biribi, sɛ eye anaa enye,sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛn werɛ bɛhow na ehu aka yɛn.
41.24: Nanso, monnka hwee,na mo nnwuma so nni mfaso;nea ɔfa mo no yɛ akyiwade.
41.25: “Makanyan obi a ofi atifi fam na ɔreba,nea ofi owia apuei na ɔbɔ me din.Otiatia ahemfo so te sɛ dɔte a wɔde si dan,te sɛ ɔnwemfo a ɔrewɔw dɔte.
41.26: Hena na ɔkaa eyi ho asɛm fii mfiase, sɛnea anka ɛbɛma yɛahu,anaa waka ato hɔ, sɛnea yebetumi aka se, ‘Ne de no ye’?Obiara anka eyi,obiara anni kan anka,obiara ante nsɛm biara amfi wo nkyɛn.
41.27: Me na midii kan ka kyerɛɛ Sion, ‘Hwɛ, woni!’Memaa Yerusalem ɔsomafo a ɔde asɛmpa ba.
41.28: Mehwɛ, nanso obiara nni hɔ,obiara nni wɔn mu a obetu wɔn fo,sɛ mibisa wɔn a, obiara ntumi mma mmuae.
41.29: Hwɛ, wɔn nyinaa yɛ atorofo!Wɔn nneyɛe nka hwee;wɔn nsɛsode yɛ mframa ne basabasayɛ nko ara.

42.1: Awurade Somfo No“Me somfo a mahyɛ no den ni,nea mayi no na ɔsɔ mʼani;mede me Honhom begu no sona ɔde atɛntrenee bɛbrɛ aman no.
42.2: Ɔrenteɛ mu anaa ɔremma ne nne so.Ɔremma ne nne so wɔ mmɔnten so.
42.3: Demmire a ayɛ mmerɛw no, ɔremmu mu.Kanea ntamabamma a ɛnnɛw yiye no, ɔrennum.Nokware mu na ɔbɛda trenee adi;
42.4: ɔrenhinhim na ɔrempa abawkosi sɛ ɔde trenee bɛba asase so.Ne mmara so na amanaman no de wɔn ani bɛto.”
42.5: Sɛɛ na Onyankopɔn, Awurade no se,nea ɔbɔɔ ɔsoro na ɔtrɛw mu,nea ɔtwee asase mu ne nea efi mu nyinaa,nea ɔma wɔn a wɔte so home,na ɔma wɔn a wɔnantew so no nkwa:
42.6: “Me, Awurade, mafrɛ wo trenee mu;meso wo nsa.Mɛhwɛ wo so na mede wo ayɛapam ama nkurɔfo none kanea ama amanamanmufo,
42.7: na woabue ani a afura,na woayi nneduafo afi afiasena woagye wɔn a wɔda afiase amoa mu, wɔn a wɔte sum kabii mu no.
42.8: “Mene Awurade; me din ne no!Meremfa mʼanuonyam mma obianaa mʼayeyi mma ahoni.
42.9: Hwɛ, nneɛma dedaw no asisi,na nneɛma foforo no mepae mu ka;ansa na ɛbɛba mu no,meka kyerɛ mo.”
42.10: Awurade Ayeyi DwomMonto dwom foforo mma Awurade!Nʼayeyi mfi asase ano,mo a mokɔ po so ne nea ɛwo mu nyinaa,mo asupɔw ne wɔn a wɔtete so nyinaa.
42.11: Ma nweatam ne so nkurow mma wɔn nne so;ma atenae a Kedar te so no nsɛpɛw wɔn ho.Ma nnipa a wɔwɔ Sela nto nnwom nnye wɔn ani;ma wɔnteɛ mu mfi mmepɔw no atifi!
42.12: Ma wɔnhyɛ Awurade anuonyam;na wɔmpae mu nka nʼayeyi no wɔ asupɔw no so.
42.13: Awurade bepue aba sɛ ɔkatakyi,te sɛ ɔkofo no, ɔbɛhyɛ ne mmɔdemmɔ mu den;ɔde nteɛmu bɛyɛ ɔkofo nkanyanna obedi nʼatamfo so nkonim.
42.14: “Mayɛ komm akyɛ,mayɛ dinn na mahyɛ me ho so.Nanso afei, te sɛ ɔbea a ɔrewo no,meteɛ mu, mehome a ensi so na mehome afrɛ so.
42.15: Mɛsɛe mmepɔw ne nkoko nona mahyew so afifide nyinaa.Mɛdan nsubɔnten ama ayɛ asupɔw,na mama atare ayoyow.
42.16: Medi anifuraefo anim afa akwan a wonnim so so,akwan a wonnim so papa so na mɛkyerɛ wɔn kwan.Mɛma sum no ayɛ hann wɔ wɔn anim,na mayɛ mmeae a ɛyɛ abonkyiabonkyi no trontrom.Eyinom ne nneɛma a mɛyɛ;merennyaw wɔn mu.
42.17: Na wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to ahoni so,na wɔka kyerɛ nsɛsode se, ‘Moyɛ yɛn anyame’ no,wɔbɛpam wɔn wɔ animguase mu.”
42.18: Israel, Onifuraefo Ne Ɔsotifo“Tie, wo ɔsotifo;hwɛ, wo onifuraefo na hu!
42.19: Hena ne onifuraefo sɛ me somfo,na ɔyɛ ɔsotifo sɛ ɔbɔfo a mesoma no?Hena na nʼani afura sɛ nea ɔde ne werɛ ahyɛ me mu,nʼani afura sɛ Awurade somfo?
42.20: Woahu nneɛma bebree, nanso amfa wo ho;Ɔkwan da wʼasom, nanso wonte hwee.”
42.21: Ɛsɔɔ Awurade ani,ne trenee ntisɛ ɔbɛma ne mmara ayɛ kɛse na anya anuonyam.
42.22: Nanso saa nnipa a wɔawia wɔn na wɔafow wɔn yi,wɔn nyinaa aka amoa muanaa wɔde wɔn asie wɔ afiase.Wɔayɛ wɔn asadena wonni obi a obegye wɔn;wɔayɛ wɔn akorɔnnena wonni obi a ɔbɛka se, “Momfa wɔn nsan nkɔ.”
42.23: Mo mu hena na obetie eyianaa nʼani beku ho yiye akyiri yi?
42.24: Hena na ɔde Yakob maa sɛ ɔmmɛyɛ akorɔnne,na ɔde Israel maa afowfo?Ɛnyɛ Awurade ayɛayɛ bɔne atia no no?Efisɛ wɔannantew nʼakwan so;na wɔanni ne mmara so.
42.25: Enti ohwiee nʼabufuwhyew guu wɔn so,akodi mu basabasayɛ.Ɛde ogyaframa bunkam wɔn so, nanso wɔante ase.Ɛhyew wɔn, nanso amfa wɔn ho.

43.1: Israel Agyenkwa KoroNa afei, sɛɛ na Awurade se,nea ɔbɔɔ wo, Yakobnea ɔnwen wo, Israel;“Nsuro na magye wo;mabɔ wo din afrɛ wo; woyɛ me dea.
43.2: Sɛ wofa nsu mu a,mɛka wo ho;na sɛ wutwa nsubɔnten no a,ɛremmu mfa wo so.Sɛ wonantew ogya no mu a,worenhyew;ogyaframa no renhye wo.
43.3: Na mene Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn,Israel Kronkronni, wo Agyenkwa.Mede Misraim yɛ mpata ma wona mede Kus ne Seba si wʼanan mu.
43.4: Sɛ wosom bo ma me na wowɔ anuonyam wɔ mʼanimna medɔ wo nti,mede nnipa bɛsesa wo,na mede nkurɔfo asesa wo nkwa.
43.5: Nsuro, efisɛ meka mo ho;mede wo mma befi apuei fam abana maboa wɔn ano afi atɔe fam.
43.6: Mɛka akyerɛ atifi fam se, ‘Munnyaa wɔn!’ne anafo fam se, ‘Munnye wɔn ntena ha.’Momfa me mmabarima mfi akyirikyiri mmrana me mmabea mfi asase ano mmra,
43.7: obiara a me din da no so,nea mebɔɔ no de hyɛɛ me ho anuonyam,nea menwen no na meyɛɛ no.”
43.8: Momfa wɔn a wɔwɔ ani, nanso wonhu adewɔn a wɔwɔ aso nanso asisiw no mmra.
43.9: Aman no nyinaa boa wɔn ho ano,na nnipa no hyia mu.Wɔn mu hena na ɔkaa eyi fii mfiasena ɔpaee mu kaa nneɛma a atwam no kyerɛɛ yɛn?Ma wɔmmfa wɔn nnansefo mmra mmedi adanse sɛ wodi bem,sɛnea afoforo bɛte na wɔaka se, “Ɛyɛ nokware.”
43.10: “Mone me nnansefo, ne mʼasomfo a mapaw no,”sɛɛ na Awurade se,“Sɛnea mubehu na moagye me adina moate ase sɛ me ne no.Wɔammɔ onyame bi anni mʼanim,na mʼakyi nso obiara remma.
43.11: Me, Me ara, Mene Awurade,na agyenkwa biara nni hɔ sɛ me.
43.12: Mada no adi na magye nkwa na mapae mu aka se,Me, na ɛnyɛ onyame nanani bi a ɔwɔ mo mu.Mone me nnansefo,” Awurade na ose sɛ, “Mene Onyankopɔn.
43.13: Yiw, na efi teteete no me ne no.Obiara rentumi nnye mfi me nsamsɛ meyɛ biribi a, hena na obetumi adan no?”
43.14: Onyankopɔn Ahummɔbɔ Ne Israel HuammɔdiSɛɛ na Awurade se,wʼAgyenkwa, Israel Kronkronni no:“Mo nti, mɛsoma akɔ Babilonia,na mede Babiloniafo nyinaa bɛba sɛ aguanfowɔ ahyɛn a wɔde hoahoa wɔn ho no mu.
43.15: Mene Awurade, wo Kronkronni no,Israel Yɛfo, wo Hene.”
43.16: Sɛɛ na Awurade se,nea ɔbɔɔ kwan wɔ po mu,kwan a ɛda asubun mu,
43.17: nea ɔtwee nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ,asraafo ne ne nkekaho nyinaa,na wɔkaa hɔ a wɔansɔre bio,wɔadum wɔn te sɛ kanea mu ntamabamma:
43.18: “Momma mo werɛ mfi kan nneɛma nomonntɔ nnkɔ nea atwam no so.
43.19: Hwɛ, mereyɛ ade foforo!Mprempren, ɛrepue; na munhu ana?Merebɔ kwan afa nweatam sona mereyɛ nsuwansuwa wɔ asase wosee so.
43.20: Mmoa a wɔyɛ keka hyɛ me anuonyam,adompo ne mpatu,efisɛ mema nsu wɔ nweatam sone nsuwansuwa wɔ asase wosee so,de ma me nkurɔfo, wɔn a mapaw wɔn no nsu,
43.21: nnipa a meyɛɛ wɔn maa me hosɛ wɔmpae mu nka mʼayeyi.
43.22: “Nanso, womfrɛɛ me, Yakob,wonhaw wo ho wɔ me ho, Israel.
43.23: Momfaa nguan mmrɛɛ me sɛ ɔhyew afɔrebɔde,na momfaa mo afɔrebɔ nhyɛɛ me anuonyam nso.Memmaa aduan afɔre nyɛɛ mo adesoana memfaa nnuhuamgye nhaw mo.
43.24: Montɔɔ nnuhuam mmrɛɛ me,na mommaa mo afɔrebɔde mu srade mmuu me so.Mmom, mode mo bɔne asoa mena mode mo mfomso ho haw abɛto me so.
43.25: “Me, me ara, mene nea ɔpepamo bɔne, me nti,na menkae mo amumɔyɛ bio.
43.26: Monhwehwɛ nea atwa mu no mu bio mma me,momma yɛmmɔ mu nnye asɛm no ho akyinnye;ka wʼasɛm a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wunni fɔ no.
43.27: Mo agya a odii kan no yɛɛ bɔne;mo kasamafo tew mʼanim atua.
43.28: Enti magu mo asɔredan mu atitiriw anim ase,na mede Yakob ama ɔsɛena mede Israel ama ahohora.

44.1: Israel, Nea Wɔapaw No“Na afei tie, Yakob me somfo,Israel, nea mapaw no.
44.2: Sɛɛ na Awurade se,nea ɔnwen wo, na ɔyɛɛ wo wɔ awotwaa mu,ɔno na ɔbɛboa wo:Nsuro Yakob, me somfo,Yeshurun, a mapaw no.
44.3: Na mehwie nsu agu asase a awo no so,ne nsuten wɔ asase kesee so;mehwie me Honhom agu wo mma so,ne me nhyira agu wʼasefo so.
44.4: Wobefifi sɛnea sare fifi wɔ mmoa adidibea,te sɛ mpampuro a ɛwɔ asuten ho.
44.5: Obi bɛka se, ‘Meyɛ Awurade de’;ɔfoforo bɛfrɛ ne ho se Yakob;afoforo bɛkɔ so akyerɛw wɔn nsa ho se, ‘Awurade de,’na wɔafa din Israel.
44.6: Ɛyɛ Awurade, Ɛnyɛ Ahoni“Sɛɛ na AwuradeIsraelhene ne Ogyefo, Asafo Awurade se:Mene odikanfo ne okyikafo;Onyankopɔn biara nni hɔ sɛ me.
44.7: Hena na ɔne me sɛ? Ma ɔmpae mu nka.Ma ɔnka na ɔnkyerɛ wɔ mʼanimnea asisi fi bere a migyee me tete nkurɔfo sii hɔ,ne nea ɛrebɛba.Yiw, ma ɔnhyɛ nea ɛreba ho nkɔm.
44.8: Mommma mo ho mpopo, munnsuro.Mampae mu anka eyi, manhyɛ ho amfi teteete ana?Mone me nnansefo. Onyankopɔn foforo bi ka me ho ana?Dabi, Ɔbotan foforo bi nni hɔ; minnim baako mpo.”
44.9: Wɔn a wɔyɛ ahoni nyinaa nka hwee,na nneɛma a ɛsom wɔn bo no so nni mfaso.Wɔn a anka wɔkasa ma wɔn no ani afura;wonnim wɔn ankasa animguase ho hwee.
44.10: Hena na ɔbɔ onyame na ogu ohoni,a ne so mma no mfaso biara?
44.11: Ɔno ne wɔn a wɔte sɛ no nyinaa anim begu ase;adwumfo nyɛ hwee sɛ nnipa.Momma wɔn nyinaa mmɔ mu nsɔre nnyina,ehu ne animguase na ɛbɛka wɔn.
44.12: Ɔtomfo fa nʼatonnadeɔde hyehyɛ nnyansramma mu;ɔde asae bobɔ so yɛ no ohoni,ɔde nʼabasa mu ahoɔden mmoroso na ɛyɛ;ɔkɔm de no na ɔyɛ mmrɛw;ɔnnom nsu nti ɔtɔ beraw.
44.13: Duadwumfo de hama susuwna ɔde kyerɛwdua sensan;na ɔde pɛe yiyi hoafei ɔde kɔmpaase hyɛ no agyirae.Osen na ɛyɛ sɛ onipa sɛso,ɛyɛ sɛ onipa wɔ nʼanuonyam nyinaa mu,sɛ wɔde besi abosonnan mu.
44.14: Otwitwaa sida,anaasɛ ebia ɔfaa kwabɔhɔre anaa odum.Ɔma enyinii wɔ kwae mu,anaa oduaa ɔpepaw, na osu ma enyinii.
44.15: Ɛyɛ nea onipa de sɔ ogya;ɔde bi ka ne ho hyew,ɔde bi sɔ ogya to brodo.Nanso ɔde bi sen onyame na ɔsɔre no;ɔyɛ ohoni na ɔkotow no.
44.16: Ɔde dua no mu fa sɔ ogya;so na ɔnoa nʼaduan,ɔtoto ne nam wɔ so na wawe amee.Afei ɔka ne ho hyew na ɔka se,Aa! mahu ogya; me ho ayɛ me hyew.
44.17: Nkae no ɔde yɛ onyame, ne ohoni;ɔkotow no na ɔsɔre no.Ɔbɔ no mpae se,“Gye me; wo ne me nyame.”
44.18: Wonnim hwee, na wɔnte hwee ase;wɔatare wɔn ani so nti wonhu ade,wɔato wɔn adwene mu nti wɔnte hwee ase.
44.19: Obiara nna nnwen ho,obiara nni nimdeɛ anaa nhumu a ɔde bɛka se,“Mede fa sɔɔ ogya;na mpo metoo brodo wɔ ne nnyansramma so;metotoo nam wɔ so wee.Ɛsɛ sɛ mede nkae no yɛ akyiwade ana?Ɛsɛ sɛ mekotow gyentia ana?”
44.20: Saa onipa no di nsõ, nnaadaa koma ma no to kwan;ɔrentumi nnye ne ho, anaa nka se,“Nea mikura wɔ me nsa nifa yi nyɛ atoro ana?”
44.21: “Kae saa nneɛma yi, Yakob,efisɛ, woyɛ me somfo, Israel.Me na meyɛɛ wo, woyɛ me somfo;Ao Israel, me werɛ remfi wo.
44.22: Mapra wo mfomso agu te sɛ omununkumne wo bɔne te sɛ anɔpa bosu.San bra me nkyɛn,efisɛ magye wo.”
44.23: Momfa ahosɛpɛw nto dwom, ɔsorosoro,na Awurade na wayɛ eyi.Mommɔ ose, asase ase.Momma nnwonto so, mo mmepɔw,mo kwae ne emu nnua nyinaa,na Awurade agye Yakob,wada nʼanuonyam adi wɔ Israel.
44.24: Wɔbɛtena Yerusalem“Sɛɛ na Awurade se,wo Gyefo a ɔnwen wo wɔ awotwaa mu no:“Mene Awurade,nea wayɛ nneɛma nyinaa,nea ɔno nko ara trɛw ɔsoro munea ɔno nko ara twee asase mu,
44.25: nea ɔsɛe atoro adiyifo nsɛnkyerɛnnena ɔma nkɔmhyɛfo yɛ nkwaseafo,nea otutu anyansafo adenim guna ɔdan no nkwaseasɛm,
44.26: nea ɔma nʼasomfo nsɛm ba munea ɔhyɛ nʼasomafo nkɔmhyɛ mu ma,“nea ɔka fa Yerusalem ho se, ‘Wɔbɛtena mu,’ne Yuda nkurow ho se, ‘Wɔbɛkyekye,’ne mmubui ho se, ‘Mɛyɛ no foforo,’
44.27: nea ɔka kyerɛ asubun se, ‘Yow,na mɛma wo nsuwa ayoyow,’
44.28: nea ɔka wɔ Kores ho se, ‘Ɔyɛ me guanhwɛfona obewie nea mepɛ nyinaa yɛ;ɔbɛka afa Yerusalem ho se, “Ma wɔnkyekyere bio,”na waka afa asɔredan no ho se, “Ma wɔnto ne fapem.” ’ ”

45.1: “Sɛɛ na Awurade ka kyerɛ nea wasra no ngo,Kores a maso ne nsa nifa musɛ ɔmmrɛ aman ase wɔ nʼanimna onnye ahemfo akode mfi wɔn nsamsɛ ommuebue apon a ɛwɔ nʼanimsɛnea kurow apon no mu rentoto.
45.2: Medi wʼanimmɛyɛ mmepɔw tamaa;mebubu kɔbere mfrafrae apon aguna matwitwa nnade adaban mu.
45.3: Mede sum mu ademude bɛma woahonyade a wɔde asie kokoa musɛnea wubehu sɛ, mene Awurade,Israel Nyankopɔn, a ɔbɔ wo din frɛ wo no.
45.4: Me somfo Yakob nti,Israel a mapaw no nti,mebɔ wo din frɛ wona mɛma wo anuonyamhyɛ abodin,ɛwɔ mu sɛ wunnyee me ntoo mu de.
45.5: Mene Awurade, obiara nni hɔ bio;Onyankopɔn biara nni hɔ ka me ho.Mɛhyɛ wo den,ɛwɔ mu sɛ wunnyee me ntoo mu de,
45.6: sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a efi nea owia puekosi beae a ɛtɔ nonnipa behu sɛ obiara nka me ho.Mene Awurade, na obiara nni hɔ bio.
45.7: Meyɛ hann, na mebɔ sum.Mede yiyedi ba na mede ɔhaw ba;Me, Awurade, na meyɛ eyinom nyinaa.
45.8: “Mo ɔsorosoro munhwie trenee ngu fam;momma emfi omununkum mu ntɔmomma asase mu mmue kɛse,na nkwagye mpue mfi mu,na trenee ne no nnyin;Me, Awurade na mayɛ.
45.9: “Nnome nka nea ɔne ne Yɛfo hamɛnka nea ɔmfra te sɛ kyɛmfɛre a ɛfra nea egugu fam mu.Dɔte betumi abisa ɔnwemfo se,‘Dɛn na woreyɛ yi?’Wʼadwuma betumi abisa wo se‘Wunni nsa’?
45.10: Nnome nka nea ose nʼagya se‘Dɛn na woawo yi?’Anaa obisa ne na se,‘Dɛn na wokyem woe?’
45.11: “Sɛɛ na Awurade se,Israel Ɔkronkronni ne ne Yɛfo;Nea ɛfa nneɛma a ɛreba ho no,wubisa me nsɛm a ɛfa me mma ho,anaa wohyɛ me wɔ me nsa ano adwuma ho?
45.12: Ɛyɛ me na meyɛɛ asasena mebɔɔ adesamma guu so.Me ara me nsa na mede trɛw ɔsoro mu;nsoromma ahorow nyinaa hyɛ mʼase.
45.13: Mɛma Kores so wɔ me trenee mu;meteɛteɛ nʼakwan nyinaa.Ɔbɛsan akyekyere me kuropɔnna wagyaa me nnommumfo,nanso ɔrennye akatua anaa akyɛde,Asafo Awurade na ose.”
45.14: Sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Nneɛma a efi Misraim ne aguade a efi Kus,ne Sebafo atenten no,wɔbɛba wo nkyɛnabɛyɛ wo dea;wobedi wʼakyi brɛoo aba awogu nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu.Wobebu nkotodwe wʼanimna wɔasrɛ wo aka se,‘Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn ka wo ho, na obi nni hɔ;onyame biara nni hɔ.’ ”
45.15: Ampa ara, woyɛ Onyankopɔn a ɔde ne ho sie,Ao Onyankopɔn ne Israel Agyenkwa.
45.16: Wɔn a wɔyɛ ahoni nyinaa bɛfɛre na wɔn anim agu ase;wɔbɛbɔ mu akɔ animguase mu.
45.17: Nanso Awurade begye Israel nkwa,ɔde daapem nkwagye;wɔremma wʼani nwu na wʼanim rengu ase biokosi daapem.
45.18: Na sɛɛ na Awurade se,nea ɔbɔɔ ɔsorosoro noɔno ne Onyankopɔn;nea ɔmaa asase, ne tebea na ɔbɔe no,ɔno na ɔtoo ne fapem;wammɔ no sɛ so nna hɔ kwa,mmom, ɔyɛe se nnipa ntena so,ɔka se:“Mene Awurade,na obi nni hɔ.
45.19: Menkasaa wɔ kokoa mu,mfi asase so baabi a aduru sum;menka nkyerɛɛ Yakob asefo se,‘Monhwehwɛ me na munhu me.’Me Awurade, meka nokware no;meka nea eye.
45.20: “Mommoaboa mo ho ano na mommra;munhyia mu, mo aguanfo a mufi amanaman so.Wɔn a wonnim de na wɔsoa nnua ahoni de kyinkyinwɔn a wɔbɔ anyame a wontumi nnye nkwa no mpae.
45.21: Mompae mu nka nea ebesi, momfa nto gua,ma wɔmmɔ mu ntu agyina.Hena na odii kan kaa no teteete,hena na ɔdaa no adi fi tete nteredee?Ɛnyɛ me Awurade ana?Onyankopɔn bi nni hɔ ka me ho,trenee Nyankopɔn ne Agyenkwa;obiara nni hɔ sɛ me.
45.22: “Monnan mmra me nkyɛn na munnya nkwa,mo a mowɔ asase ano nyinaa;efisɛ mene Onyankopɔn, na obiara nni hɔ.
45.23: Maka me ho ntam,mʼano aka wɔ nokwaredi nyinaa muasɛm a wɔntwe nsan sɛ:obiara bebu nkotodwe wɔ mʼanim.Na obiara bɛpae mu aka se, mene Onyankopɔn.
45.24: Wɔbɛka me ho asɛm se, ‘Awurade nko ara muna trenee ne ahoɔden wɔ.’ ”Wɔn a wɔn bo huru tia no nyinaabɛba ne nkyɛn na wɔn anim begu ase.
45.25: Nanso Awurade mu, Israel asefo nyinaawobebu wɔn bem, na wɔahoahoa wɔn ho.

46.1: Babilonia AnyameBel bɔ ne mu ase, Nebo brɛ ne dibea ase;mfurum soa wɔn ahoni.Nsɛsode a wɔso nenam no mu yɛ duru,ɛyɛ adesoa ma nea wabrɛ.
46.2: Wɔbɔ mu kotow, bɔ wɔn mu ase;wontumi nsiw amanehunu ano,wɔn ankasa kɔ nkoasom mu.
46.3: “Muntie me, Yakobfifo,mo a moaka wɔ Israelfi nyinaa,mo a maso mo mu fi mo nyinsɛn mu,na maturu mo afi bere a wɔwoo mo.
46.4: Mpo kosi mo nkwakoraa bere ne bere a mubefuw dwen mu,Me ne no, Me ne nea obeso mo mu.Mabɔ mo na meturu mo;mɛwowaw mo na megye mo.
46.5: “Hena ho na mode me bɛto, anaa mubebu no me sɛso?Hena na mode me besusuw no, na mode no atoto me ho?
46.6: Ebinom hwie sikakɔkɔɔ fi wɔn nkotoku muna wɔkari dwetɛ wɔ nsania so;wɔbɔ sika dwumfo paa, ma ɔde yɛ onyame bi,na wɔkotow sɔre no.
46.7: Wɔsoa no wɔ wɔn mmati so,wɔde kosi nʼafa, na ɛka hɔ ara.Ɛrentumi mfi faako a esi.Obi teɛ mu frɛ no de, nanso ommua;ɛrentumi nyi no mfi ne haw mu.
46.8: “Monkae yiye, momma ɛnka mo tirim,munnwen ho mo atuatewfo.
46.9: Monkae nneɛma a atwam no, teteete nneɛma no;Mene Onyankopɔn, na obi nni hɔ;Mene Onyankopɔn, na obiara nte sɛ me.
46.10: Meda awiei adi fi mfiase,efi tete, meka nea ɛbɛba.Meka se: ‘Mʼatirimpɔw begyina,na mɛyɛ nea mepɛ nyinaa.’
46.11: Mɛfrɛ anomaa a ɔkyere mmoa afi apuei fam;afi akyirikyiri asase so, onipa a ɔbɛhyɛ me botae ma.Nea maka no, ɛno na mɛma aba mu;nea madwen ho no, ɛno na mɛyɛ.
46.12: Muntie me, mo a moyɛ akokodurufo,mo a mo ne trenee ntam kwan ware;
46.13: Mede me trenee rebɛn,enni akyirikyiri;na me nkwagye nso renkyɛ.Mɛma Sion nkwagye,na mede mʼanuonyam ama Israel.

47.1: Babilonia Asehwe“Sian kɔ, tena mfutuma mu,Ɔbabea Babilonia;tena fam na mfa ahengua,Babiloniafo hemmea kuropɔn.Wɔremfrɛ wo bio se,nsiforo anaa nea ne ho yɛ na.
47.2: Fa awiyammo na yam esiam;yi wo nkataanim no.Ma wʼatade so kɔ soro, na wo nan ho ngu hɔ,na fa nsuwansuwa no mu.
47.3: Wʼadagyaw bɛda adina wʼanimguase so renkata.Mɛtɔ were;meremfa obiara ho nkyɛ no.”
47.4: Yɛn Gyefo, Asafo Awurade ne ne din,ɔno ne Israel Kronkronni.
47.5: “Tena ase dinn, kɔhyɛ sum mu,Babiloniafo hemmea kurow;wɔremfrɛ wo bio seahenni ahorow so hemmea.
47.6: Me bo fuw me nkurɔfo,na miguu mʼagyapade ho fi;mede wɔn hyɛɛ wo nsa,na woanhu wɔn mmɔbɔ.Nkwakoraa koraa mpo,wosoaa wɔn konnua duruduru.
47.7: Wokae se, ‘Mɛkɔ so daa,ayɛ ɔhemmea afebɔɔ.’Nanso woannwen saa nneɛma yi hona woansusuw nea ebetumi asi ho.
47.8: “Afei tie, wo oguamanfo,woredwudwo wo ho wɔ wo bammɔ muna woka kyerɛ wo ho se,‘me ne no, na obiara nni hɔ sɛ me.Merenyɛ okunafo dana merenni awommawu.’
47.9: Saa nneɛma abien yi bɛto woprɛko pɛ, da koro pɛ:awommawu ne kunayɛ.Saa nneɛma yi bɛba wo so pa ara,wʼabayisɛm bebrebe yine ntafowayi a mu yɛ den nyinaa akyi.
47.10: Wode wo ho ato wʼamumɔyɛ sona waka se, ‘Obiara nhu me.’Wo nyansa ne nimdeɛ ma wo fom kwanbere a woka kyerɛ wo ho se,‘Me ne no, obiara nni hɔ ka me ho.’
47.11: Amanehunu bɛto wo,na worenhu ɔkwan ko a wobɛfa so ayi afi hɔ.Ɔhaw bi bɛba wo soa worentumi mfa mpata nyi mfi hɔ;atoyerɛnkyɛm a ɛnnaa ne ho adi nkyerɛɛ wobɛba wo so mpofirim.
47.12: “Kɔ so yɛ wo ntafowayine wʼabayisɛm bebrebea wode adi dwuma fi wo mmofraase no.Ebia wubedi nkonim,ebia wode ehu bɛba.
47.13: Woabrɛ wɔ afotufo bebrebe a woanya no mu!Ma wo nsoromma ho anyansafo mmra anim,wɔn a wɔhwɛ nsoromma mu no, ka nea ɛreba ɔsram biara mu no,ma wonnye wo mfi nea ɛreba wo so no mu.
47.14: Nokwarem, wɔte sɛ gyentia;ogya bɛhyew wɔn.Na wontumi nnye wɔn ankasa homfi ogyaframa anoden no ho.Nnyansramma biara nni ha a ɛbɛka obiara hyew;ogya biara nni ha a wɔbɛtena ho ato.
47.15: Nea wobetumi ayɛ ama wo ara ne no,eyinom na wo ne wɔn abrɛna wo ne wɔn anantew fi mmofraase.Wɔn mu biara kɔ so yɛ ne mfomso;ɔbaako mpo nni hɔ a obetumi agye wo.

48.1: Israel Ɔsoɔdenfo“Muntie eyi, Yakobfifomo a wɔde Israel din frɛ mo,na moyɛ Yuda asefo,mo a mobɔ Awurade din ka ntam,na mofrɛ Israel Nyankopɔn,nanso ɛnyɛ nokware anaa trenee mu,
48.2: mo a mofrɛ mo ho kurow kronkron no mmana mode mo ho to Israel Nyankopɔn so,Asafo Awurade ne ne din.
48.3: Mehyɛɛ nneɛma a atwa mu no ho nkɔm dedaada,mebɔɔ nkae, na medaa no adi;afei mpofirim mekekaa me ho na ɛbaa mu.
48.4: Na minim sɛnea moyɛ asoɔden famo kɔn ho ntin yɛ dadena mo moma yɛ kɔbere mfrafrae.
48.5: Enti, mekaa saa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ mo dedaadaansa na ɛrebesisi no, mebɔɔ mo nkaesɛnea morentumi nka se,‘Mʼahoni na wɔyɛe:me dua nsɛsode ne me dade nyame na ɔhyɛe.’
48.6: Moate eyinom nyinaa; monhwɛ wɔn nyinaa.Morennye wɔn nto mu ana?“Efi saa bere yi de rekɔ mɛka nsɛm foforo akyerɛ mo,ɛfa nneɛma a ahintaw a munnim ho.
48.7: Afei na wɔayɛ koraa, ɛnkyɛe;ebesi nnɛ no na anka montee ho hwee.Enti morentumi nka se,‘Yiw na minim dedaw!’
48.8: Wontee, na wontee ase;efi tete nyinaa wʼaso asiw.Na minim sɛ woyɛ ɔfatwafo;wɔfrɛɛ wo otuatewfo fi ɔyafunu mu.
48.9: Me din nti metwentwɛn mʼabufuw so;mʼayeyi nti miyi fi wo so,sɛnea merensɛe wo koraa.
48.10: Hwɛ mahoa mo ho, ɛnyɛ sɛnea wɔnan dwetɛ ho;mmom, masɔ wo ahwɛ wɔ amanehunu fononoo mu.
48.11: Me nti, me nti, na meyɛ eyi.Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ mema ho kwan na wɔsɛe me din?Memma obi nnye mʼanuonyam.
48.12: Israel Ahofadi“Tie me, Yakob,Israel a mafrɛ no;Me ne no;Me ne odikanfo ne okyikafo.
48.13: Me ara me nsa na ɛtoo asase fapem,na me nsa na ɛtrɛw ɔsorosoro mu;sɛ mefrɛ wɔn a,wɔn nyinaa bɔ mu sɔre.
48.14: “Mo nyinaa mommɔ mu mmra mmetie:ahoni no mu nea ɔwɔ he na waka saa nsɛm yi dedaw?Awurade boafo a wapaw nobɛma nʼatirimpɔw a etia Babilonia aba mu;ne basa betia Babiloniafo.
48.15: Me, me na makasa.Yiw, mafrɛ no.Mede no bɛba,na obewie nʼadwuma nkonimdi so.
48.16: “Montwiw mmɛn me na muntie eyi:“Efi nkaebɔ a edi kan no, menkasaa wɔ kokoa mu;bere biara a ebesi no, na mewɔ hɔ.”Na afei Asafo Awuradede ne Honhom asoma me.
48.17: Sɛɛ na Awurade se,mo gyefo, Israel Kronkronni no:“Mene Awurade mo Nyankopɔn,nea ɔkyerɛ mo nea eye ma mo,na ɔkyerɛ mo ɔkwan a ɛsɛ sɛ mofa so.
48.18: Sɛ mudii mʼahyɛde so a,anka mo asomdwoe ayɛ sɛ asubɔnten,na mo trenee ayɛ sɛ po asorɔkye.
48.19: Anka mo asefo ayɛ sɛ nwea,na mo mma ayɛ sɛ ne mmosea a wontumi nkan;wɔn din rempepa dawɔrensɛe mfi mʼanim.”
48.20: Mumfi Babilonia,munguan mfi Babiloniafo nkyɛn!Momfa osebɔ nteɛmu mmɔ nkaena mompae mu nka eyi.Momfa nkɔ nsase ano;monka se, “Awurade abegye ne somfo Yakob.”
48.21: Osukɔm anne wɔn bere a odii wɔn anim, wɔ nweatam ahorow so no,ɔmaa nsu fii ɔbotan mu ba maa wɔn;ɔpaee ɔbotan no mu, maa nsu tue fii mu.
48.22: “Asomdwoe nni hɔ mma amumɔyɛfo.” Sɛɛ na Awurade se.

49.1: Awurade Somfo NoMuntie me, mo mpoano aman;monyɛ aso mo akyirikyiri amanansa na wɔrebɛwo me no, Awurade frɛɛ meɔbɔɔ me din ansa na wɔrewo me.
49.2: Ɔyɛɛ mʼano sɛ afoa nnamnam,Ɔde me hintaw ne nsa ase nwini mu;ɔde me yɛɛ agyan a ano yɛ nnamna ɔde me hyɛɛ ne boha mu.
49.3: Ɔka kyerɛɛ me se, “Woyɛ me somfo,Israel, wo mu na mɛda mʼanuonyam adi.”
49.4: Nanso mekae se, “Mabrɛ agumasɛe mʼahoɔden kwa, mannya mu hweenanso nea ɛwɔ me wɔ Awurade nsamna mʼakatua wɔ me Nyankopɔn nkyɛn.”
49.5: Na afei, Awurade kasa se,nea ɔnwen me wɔ awotwaa mu sɛ memmɛyɛ ne somfosɛ memfa Yakob nsan mmra ne nkyɛnna me mmoaboa Israel ano mma no no,wahyɛ me anuonyam wɔ Awurade ani sona me Nyankopɔn ayɛ mʼahoɔden.
49.6: Ɔka se,“Ɛyɛ ade ketewa bi ma wo sɛ wobɛyɛ me somfosɛ wode Yakob mmusuakuw bɛsan abana wode Israelfo a mede wɔn asie bɛsan aba.Mɛma moayɛ amanamanmufo nyinaa kanea,ɛnam mo so na wobegye wiasefo nyinaa nkwa.”
49.7: Sɛɛ na Awurade se,Ogyefo ne Israel ɔkronkronni node kɔma nea aman buu no animtiaa na wokyii no,ahemfo somfo no;“Ahene behu wo na wɔasɔreahenemma behu wo na wɔakotow woesiane Awurade a ɔyɛ ɔnokwafo,Israel ɔkronkronni a wayi wo no nti.”
49.8: Israel Si Ne Dedaw MuSɛɛ na Awurade se:“Bere a ɛsɛ mu no, mebua wo,na nkwagyeda no, mɛboa wo;mɛkora wo na mede wo ayɛapam ama nkurɔfo no,de agye asase no asi hɔakyekyɛ agyapade ahorow a asɛe no bio,
49.9: wobɛka akyerɛ nneduafo se, ‘Mumfi mmra!’ne wɔn a wɔwɔ sum mu se, ‘Momfa mo ho nni!’“Wobedidi wɔ akwan howobenya adidibea wɔ koko kesee biara so.
49.10: Ɔkɔm renne wɔn na osukɔm nso renne wɔn;nweatam so hyew ne owia ano hyew renka wɔn,nea ɔwɔ ayamhyehye ma wɔn no bɛkyerɛ wɔn kwanna ɔde wɔn akɔ nsuaniwa ho.
49.11: Mɛyɛ me mmepɔw nyinaa akwan,na mʼatempɔn nso mɛma akrɔn.
49.12: Hwɛ, wufi akyirikyiri bɛbaebinom befi atifi fam, ebinom befi atɔe famebinom nso befi Sinin mantam mu.”
49.13: Momfa anigye nteɛ mu, ɔsoro;di ahurusi, asase;mompae mu nnwonto mu, mmepɔw!Na Awurade kyekye ne nkurɔfo werɛ,na obehu nʼamanehunufo mmɔbɔ.
49.14: Nanso Sion kae se, “Awurade agyaw me hɔ,Awurade werɛ afi me.”
49.15: “Ɛna werɛ betumi afi ne ba a otua nufu anoa ɔrennya ayamhyehye mma ɔba a waturu no no ana?Ebia ne werɛ befi,na me werɛ remfi wo!
49.16: Hwɛ, makurukyerɛw wo din agu me nsa yamwʼafasu wɔ mʼani so daa.
49.17: Mo mmabarima resan aba ntɛm so;na wɔn a wɔsɛe mo no refi mo nkyɛn akɔ.
49.18: Momma mo ani so nhwɛ mo ho nhyia;mo mmabarima nyinaa reboa wɔn ho ano aba mo nkyɛn.Sɛ mete ase yi” sɛnea Awurade se,“mode wɔn bɛyɛ ahyehyɛde ama mo homubefura wɔn sɛ ayeforokunu.
49.19: “Ɛwɔ mu sɛ wɔsɛee mo yɛɛ mo pasaamaa mo asase daa mpan,afei nnipa bɛhyɛ wo so ma, ama aboro wo so,na wɔn a wɔsɛee wo no bɛkɔ akyirikyiri.
49.20: Mmofra a wɔwoo wɔn wɔ mo nna bɔne mu nobɛka ama moate sɛ,‘Ɛha sua ma yɛn dodo;momma yɛn asase no bi nka ho na yɛntena so.’
49.21: Na wobɛka wɔ wo koma mu se,‘Hena na ɔwoo eyinom maa me?Na meyɛ ɔwerɛhowni ne obonin;wotuu me kɔɔ asase foforo so na wɔpoo me.Hena na ɔtetew eyinom?Wogyaw me nko arana eyinom, he na wofi bae?’ ”
49.22: Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade se:“Hwɛ, menyama amanamanmufo,mɛma me frankaa no so akyerɛ nkurɔfo nowobeturu wo mmabarima wɔ wɔn nsa so abana wɔbɛsoa wo mmabea wɔ wɔn mmati so.
49.23: Ahemfo bɛyɛ mo agyanom nsiananmu,na wɔn ahemmea ayɛ ɛnanom a wɔbɛhwɛ mo.Wɔbɛkotow mo a wɔn anim butubutuw fam;wɔbɛtaforo mo nan ase mfutuma.Afei mubehu sɛ mene Awurade.Wɔn a wɔn ani da me so no, merenni wɔn huammɔ.”
49.24: Wobetumi agye asade afi akofo nsam;anaa wobetumi agye nnommumfo afi otirimɔdenfo nsam?
49.25: Nanso, sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Yiw, wobegye nnommumfo afi akofo nsamna wɔagye asade afi otirimɔdenfo nsam;me ne wɔn a wɔne wo nya no benyana megye wo mma nkwa.
49.26: Mema wɔn a wɔhyɛ wo so no awe wɔn ankasa honam;wɔn mogya bɛbow wɔn sɛnea wɔanom nsa.Afei adesamma nyinaa behusɛ me, Awurade, me ne wʼAgyenkwa no,wo Gyefo, Yakob Tumfo No.”

50.1: Israel Amumɔyɛ Ne Ɔsomfo No SetieSɛɛ na Awurade se:“Ɛhe na awaregyae ho adansedi nhoma,nea migyinaa so gyaa no kwan no wɔ?Anaa sɛ mʼadefirifo mu henana metɔn wo maa no?Wo bɔne nti na wɔtɔn wo;Wʼamumɔyɛ nti na wɔpam wo na.
50.2: Mebae no, adɛn nti na na obiara nni hɔ?Mefrɛe no, adɛn nti na obiara annye so?Na me nsa yɛ tia dodo sɛ ebegye wo ana?Minni ahoɔden a mede begye wo ana?Mede mʼanimka kɛkɛ no ma po yow,medan nsubɔnten nweatammu mpataa porɔw esiane nsu a wonnya ntina osukɔm kum wɔn.
50.3: Mede sum fura ɔsorona mema atweaatam yɛ ne nkataho.”
50.4: Asafo Awurade ama me nkyerɛkyerɛ tɛkrɛmasɛ ɛnka asɛm a ɛhyɛ ɔbrɛfo den.Onyan me anɔpa biara,na obue mʼaso ma mitie sɛ obi a ɔregye nkyerɛkyerɛ.
50.5: Otumfo Awurade abue mʼasona menyɛɛ otuatewfo ɛ;na mensan mʼakyi ɛ.
50.6: Mede mʼakyi maa wɔn a wɔboro me,ne mʼafono maa wɔn a wotutu mʼabogyesɛ.Mamfa mʼanim anhintaw wɔnfɛwdi ne ntasu ho.
50.7: Esiane sɛ, Asafo Awurade boa me nti,wɔrengu mʼanim ase.Enti na mayɛ mʼanim sɛ ɔtwɛrebo,na minim sɛ mʼanim rengu ase.
50.8: Nea obu me bem no abɛn.Enti hena na ɔbɛbɔ me kwaadu?Ɔmma yenhyia mu!Hena na ɔbɔ me sobo?Ma ɔnka nsi mʼanim!
50.9: Asafo Awurade na ɔboa me.Hena ne nea obebu me fɔ?Wɔn nyinaa bɛtetew sɛ atade;nnwewemmoa bɛwe wɔn.
50.10: Mo mu hena na osuro Awurade,na odi ne somfo asɛm so?Ma nea ɔnam sum munea onni hann no,onnye Awurade din nnina ɔmfa ne ho nto ne Nyankopɔn so.
50.11: Na afei, mo a mososɔ ogya nyinaana moyɛ ogyatɛn ma mo ho,monkɔ, nkɔnantew mo gya hann no,ne ogyatɛn a wɔasɔ ano no mu.Eyi ne nea mubenya afi me nsa mu;mobɛdeda fam wɔ ɔyaw mu.

51.1: Sion Daapem Nkwagye“Muntie me, mo a mopɛ trenee akyi kwan;na mohwehwɛ Awurade;Monhwɛ ɔbotan a wotwaa mo fii mu none abopaebea a wotuu mo fii hɔ no;
51.2: Monhwɛ Abraham, mo agya,ne Sara a ɔwoo mo no.Bere a mefrɛɛ no no, na ɔyɛ ɔbaakofo,na mihyiraa no maa nʼase trɛwee.
51.3: Awurade bɛkyekye Sion werɛ ampa arana ne yam bɛhyehye no wɔ ne nnwiriwii no ho;ɔbɛyɛ ne nweatam ahorow sɛ Eden,nʼasase a ada mpan bɛyɛ sɛ Awurade turo.Wobehu anigye ne ahosɛpɛw,aseda ne nnwonto wɔ ne mu.
51.4: “Muntie me, me nkurɔfo;monyɛ aso mma me, me man:Mmara no befi me nkyɛn akɔ;na mʼatɛntrenee bɛyɛ hann ama aman no.
51.5: Me trenee reba ntɛm so,me nkwagye nam kwan so,na me basa de atɛntrenee bɛbrɛ aman no.Asupɔw no bɛhwɛ mena wɔde anidaso bɛtwɛn me basa.
51.6: Momma mo ani so nhwɛ ɔsorosoro,monhwɛ asase wɔ fam;ɔsorosoro betu ayera sɛ wusiwna asase bɛtetew sɛ atadena wɔn a wɔte so bewuwu sɛ nwansena.Nanso me nkwagye bɛtena hɔ daa,me trenee to rentwa da.
51.7: “Muntie me, mo a munim nea ɛteɛ,mo a me mmara wɔ mo koma mu:Munnsuro nnipa animkaanaa momma wɔn ahohora ntu mo koma.
51.8: Na nnwewemmoa bɛwe wɔn te sɛnea wɔwe atade;asunson bɛsɛe wɔn te sɛnea wɔsɛe kuntu.Nanso me trenee bɛtena hɔ daa,me nkwagye befi awo ntoatoaso akosi awo ntoatoaso so.”
51.9: Nyan, nyan! Awurade basa,hyɛ ahoɔden adurade;nyan te sɛ nna a atwa mu no,te sɛ tete awo ntoatoaso mu no.Ɛnyɛ wo na wutwitwaa Rahab mu asinasin no,na wuhwirew asuboa kɛse no mu no?
51.10: Ɛnyɛ wo na womaa po yowee,asubun mu nsu no,nea ɔpaee kwan wɔ po bun mu nosɛnea wɔn a wɔagye wɔn no betumi atwa?
51.11: Wɔn a Awurade apata ama wɔn bɛsan aba.Wɔde nnwonto bɛhyɛn Sion;anigye a ɛnsa da bɛyɛ wɔn abotiri,anigye ne ahosɛpɛw bɛboro wɔn so,awerɛhow ne apinisi betu ayera.
51.12: “Me, me ara, mene wo werɛkyekyefo.Hena ne wo a wusuro ɔdesani,nnipa mma a wɔyɛ sare yi.
51.13: Na wo werɛ afi Awurade, wo yɛfonea ɔtrɛw ɔsorosoro muna ɔhyɛɛ asase ase no,a da biara na woabɔ huɔhyɛsoni no abufuw nti,nea ɔde ɔsɛe asi nʼani so no ana?Na ɔhyɛsoni no abufuw wɔ he?
51.14: Ɛrenkyɛ, wobegyaa nneduafo ahufo no;wɔrenwuwu wɔ afiase amoa mu,na aduan remmɔ wɔn.
51.15: Na mene Awurade, wo Nyankopɔnnea ɔhwanyan po, ma nʼasorɔkye woro so.Asafo Awurade ne ne din.
51.16: Mede me nsɛm ahyɛ wʼanom,na mede me nsa ase nwini akata wo so.Me a mede ɔsorosoro sii hɔna mehyɛɛ asase ase,na meka kyerɛ Sion se, ‘Moyɛ me nkurɔfo.’ ”
51.17: Awurade Abufuwhyew Kuruwa NoNyan, nyan!Sɔre, Yerusalem!Wo a woanom afi Awurade nsamnʼabufuw kuruwa no,wo a woanom apɔɔdɔ mu nsa atu puwnea ɛma nnipa tɔ ntintan no.
51.18: Ne mma a ɔwoo wɔn nyinaa noobiara nni hɔ a ɔkyerɛ no kwan;mma a ɔtetew wɔn nyinaa noobiara nni hɔ a oso ne nsa mu.
51.19: Saa ɔhaw prenu yi aba wo so,hena na ɔbɛkyekye wo werɛ?Nnwiriwii ne ɔsɛe, ɔkɔm ne afoa,hena na ɔbɛhyɛ wo den?
51.20: Wo mma atotɔ beraw;wɔdeda mmɔnten so baabiara,te sɛ ɔtwe a afiri ayi no.Awurade abufuw aba wɔn so,wo Nyankopɔn animka no.
51.21: Enti tie eyi, wo a worehu amanewoabow, nanso ɛnyɛ nsa na abow wo.
51.22: Sɛɛ na Otumfo Awurade se,wo Nyankopɔn a ɔbɔ ne nkurɔfo ho ban:Hwɛ, magye afi wo nsa mu,kuruwa a ɛma wotɔɔ ntintan no,kuruwa a ɛyɛ mʼabufuw pɔɔdɔ no,worennom bio.
51.23: Mede bɛhyɛ wɔn a wɔhaw mo no nsa mu,wɔn a wɔka kyerɛɛ mo se,“Butuw fam na yɛnnantew wo sona wode wʼakyi yɛɛ fam,te sɛ abɔnten sɛ wɔnnantew so no.”

52.1: Nyan, nyan, Sion,hyɛ ahoɔden adurade no.Hyɛ wo ntade fɛɛfɛ noYerusalem kuropɔn kronkron no.Momonotofo ne wɔn a wɔn ho agu firenwura wʼapon mu bio.
52.2: Poroporow wo ho mfutuma.Sɔre, tena ahengua so, Yerusalem.Yiyi nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn no fi wo kɔn mu,Ɔbabea Sion a wɔafa wo nnommum.
52.3: Na sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Wɔantɔn wo annye hwee,na ɛnyɛ sika na wɔde begye wo.”
52.4: Na sɛɛ na Otumfo Awurade se:“Bere bi me nkurɔfo kɔɔ Misraim kɔtenaa hɔ;akyiri no Asiria bɛhyɛɛ wɔn so.
52.5: “Na mprempren dɛn na mewɔ wɔ ha?” Sɛɛ na Awurade se.“Wɔafa me nkurɔfo kɔ kwa,na wɔn sodifo di fɛw,”Awurade na ose.“Da mu no nyinaawɔkɔ so gu me din ho fi.
52.6: Enti me nkurɔfo behu me din;enti da no wobehu sɛɛyɛ me na mehyɛɛ ho nkɔm.Yiw, ɛyɛ me.”
52.7: Hwɛ sɛnea wɔn a wɔde asɛmpa no rebaanammɔn si yɛ fɛ wɔ mmepɔw no so,wɔn a wɔpae mu ka asomdwoesɛm,wɔn a wɔbɔ amanneɛdɛ,wɔn a wɔpae mu ka nkwagye ho asɛmna wɔka kyerɛ Sion se,“Mo Nyankopɔn di hene.”
52.8: Muntie! Mo awɛmfo ma wɔn nne so;wɔbɔ mu de anigye teɛ mu.Sɛ Awurade san ba Sion a,wɔde wɔn ani behu.
52.9: Mommɔ mu ntue anigye nnwonto,mo Yerusalem nnwiriwii,efisɛ, Awurade akyekye ne nkurɔfo werɛwagye Yerusalem.
52.10: Awurade beyi ne basa kronkron no howɔ amanaman nyinaa animna asase ano nyinaa behu yɛn Nyankopɔn nkwagye.
52.11: Monkɔ. Mumfi hɔ nkɔ!Mommfa mo ho nnka biribiara a ho ntew.Mumfi ho na mo ho ntew,mo a mukurakura Awurade nkuruwa.
52.12: Morentutu mmirika mfi haanaa morenguan;efisɛ Awurade bedi mo anim,Israel Nyankopɔn bɛbɔ mo kyidɔm.
52.13: Ɔsomfo No Amanehunu Ne NʼanuonyamHwɛ, me somfo bedi yiyewɔbɛma no so ayɛ no ɔkɛse.
52.14: Nea ɛmaa dodow a wohuu no ho dwiriw wɔn no,wɔsɛee nʼanim a ansɛ onipa biara dena nʼabɔsu sɛe a ɛnsɛ ɔdesani de,
52.15: saa ara na ɔbɛma aman bebree ho adwiriw wɔnna ahemfo bemuamua wɔn ano, ne nti.Wɔn a wɔnkaa ne ho asɛm nkyerɛɛ wɔn no behu,na wɔn a wɔntee no nso bɛte ase.

53.1: Hena na wagye yɛn asɛm no adi?na Awurade abasa no, hena so na ada adi?
53.2: Onyin wɔ nʼanim te sɛ dua amono ketewa bi,te sɛ ntin a efi asase wosee mu.Onni ahoɔfɛ anaa anuonyam a ɛbɛtwetwe yɛn akɔ ne nkyɛn.Ne tebea mu nni biribiara a ɛbɛma yɛapɛ no.
53.3: Nnipa bɔɔ no ahohora na wɔpoo no,Ɔwerɛhowni a onim ɔyaw.Te sɛ obi a nnipa de wɔn anim hintaw nowobuu no animtiaa na yɛammu no.
53.4: Ampa ara ɔfaa yɛn mmerɛwyɛ,na ɔsoaa yɛn awerɛhow,nanso yebuu no sɛ Onyankopɔn na watwe nʼaso.Yebuu no sɛ, Onyankopɔn na wabɔ no na wadwerɛw no.
53.5: Nanso yɛn mmarato nti na wopiraa no,yɛn amumɔyɛ nti na wɔdwerɛw no;asotwe a ɛde asomdwoe brɛɛ yɛn no daa no so,na nʼapirakuru mu na yenya ayaresa.
53.6: Yɛn nyinaa ayerayera te sɛ nguan,yɛn mu biara afa ne kwan;na Awurade de yɛn nyinaaamumɔyɛ ato no so.
53.7: Wɔhyɛɛ no so, yɛɛ no ayayade,nanso wammue nʼano;wɔde no kɔɔ te sɛ oguamma a wɔrekokum no.Sɛnea oguamma yɛ komm wɔ ne nwitwitwafo anim no,saa ara na wammue nʼano.
53.8: Wɔnam nhyɛso ne atemmu so faa no kɔe.Na hena na obetumi aka nʼasefo ho asɛm?Efisɛ woyii no fii asase yi so;me nkurɔfo mmarato nti wɔtwee nʼaso.
53.9: Wɔyɛɛ ne da wɔ abɔnefo mu,na ne wu mu wɔde no too adefo muɛwɔ mu, wanyɛ akakabensɛm biara,na obiara ante atosɛm biara amfi nʼano.
53.10: Nanso ɛyɛɛ Awurade pɛ sɛ ɔbɛdwerɛw no ama no ahu amanempo ɔde ne nkwa yɛ afɔdi afɔrebɔde,obehu nʼasefo na ne nna bɛware,na Awurade pɛ bɛkɔ so wɔ ne nsam.
53.11: Ne kra amanehunu akyi,obehu nkwa hann, na ne koma atɔ ne yam;na ne suahu mu me somfo treneeni no bebu bebree bem,na wasoa wɔn amumɔyɛ.
53.12: Enti mɛma no kyɛfa wɔ atitiriw mu,na ɔne ahoɔdenfo bɛkyɛ asadeefisɛ ɔde ne nkwa too hɔ maa owu,na wɔkan no fraa mmaratofo.Ɔsoaa nnipa bebree bɔne,na odi maa mmaratofo.

54.1: Sion Daakye Anuonyam“To nnwom, obonin,wo a wonwoo da;pae mu to nnwom, teɛ mu di ahurusi,wo a awo nkaa wo da;efisɛ ɔbea a wannya awo da no mmadɔɔso sen nea ɔwɔ kunu,”Awurade na ose.
54.2: “Trɛw wo ntamadan no mu;twe wo ntamadan ntwamu no mu,nnyae yɛ;toa wo ntampehama no so,bobɔ wo nnyinaso no so ma entim yiye.
54.3: Efisɛ wobɛtrɛw akɔ nifa ne benkum;wʼasefo begye aman afana wɔatena wɔn nkuropɔn amamfo so.
54.4: “Nsuro; wʼanim rengu ase.Nsuro aniwu; wɔremmrɛ wo ase.Wo werɛ befi wo mmabun mu aniwuna wo kunayɛ mu ahohora nso worenkae bio.
54.5: Na wo Bɔfo yɛ wo kunuAsafo Awurade ne ne din,Israel Kronkronni no yɛ wo Gyefo.Wɔfrɛ no asase nyinaa so Nyankopɔn.
54.6: Awurade bɛsan afrɛ wote sɛ ɔyere a woagyaa no na odi yaw wɔ ne koma mu,ɔyere a ɔwaree mmabaabere muna wogyaa no mpofirim,” wo Nyankopɔn na ose.
54.7: “Migyaw wo bere tiaa bi mu,nanso mifi ayamhyehye a mu dɔ mu bɛsan de wo aba.
54.8: Abufuw mmoroso mu,mede mʼani hintaw wo mmere tiaa bi,nanso mʼayamye a ɛnsa da nti,mehu wo mmɔbɔ,”nea Awurade, wo Gyefo se ni.
54.9: “Eyi te sɛ Noa mmere so a mekaa ntam semeremma nsuyiri nkata asase ani bio.Enti afei maka ntam se meremma me bo mfuw wo bio,na merenka wʼanim bio.
54.10: Sɛ mmepɔw wosow,na nkoko tutu a,me dɔ a ɛnsa da a mewɔ ma wo no renhinhimna mʼasomdwoe apam no rentwa mu,”sɛɛ na Awurade a ɔwɔ ahummɔbɔ ma mo no se.
54.11: “Kuropɔn a ahum abubu wo na wɔnkyekyee wo werɛ ɛ,mede abo anintɔnka besiesie wo,na mede aboɔdemmo bibiri ayɛ wo fapem.
54.12: Mede bogyabo bɛto wʼabantifi afasu,na mede abohemaa a ɛhyerɛn ayɛ wʼapon,na mede aboɔdemmo ayɛ wʼafasu nyinaa.
54.13: Awurade bɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo mmabarima nyinaa,na wo mma asomdwoe bɛdɔɔso.
54.14: Wubetim wɔ trenee mu:Wo ne nhyɛsotraso ntam kwan bɛwareworensuro biribiara.Ahupoo bɛkɔ akyirikyiri,na ɛremmɛn wo.
54.15: Sɛ obi tow hyɛ wo so a, na emfi me;na nea ɔtow hyɛ wo so no de ne ho bɛma wo.
54.16: “Hwɛ, ɛyɛ me na mebɔɔ ɔtomfoa ofita nnyansramma mu ma ɛdɛwna ɔde ahoɔden bɔ akode a ɛfata ne dwumadi.Na ɛyɛ me na mabɔ ɔsɛefo sɛ ɔmmɛsɛe ade;
54.17: akode biara a wɔabɔ atia wo no rennyinana tɛkrɛma biara a ɛbɛbɔ wo sobo no wobɛbɔ agu.Eyi ne Awurade nkoa agyapade,ne wɔn bembu a efi me,”Awurade na ose.

55.1: Osukɔm Ho Ɔfrɛ“Mommra, mo a osukɔm de mo nyinaa,mommra nsu no ho;na mo a munni sika,mommra mmɛtɔ na munni!Mommra mmɛtɔ nsa ne nufusua munntua hwee.
55.2: Adɛn nti na mosɛe sika wɔ nea ɛnyɛ aduan hone mo ahoɔden wɔ nea ɛmmee ho?Muntie, muntie me na munni nea eye,na mo kra ani begye nnepa a ɛwɔ akatua pa ho.
55.3: Monyɛ aso, na mommra me nkyɛn;muntie me, na mo kra anya nkwa.Me ne mo bɛyɛ apam a ɛte hɔ daa,me dɔ a to ntwa da a mede hyɛɛ Dawid bɔ no.
55.4: Hwɛ, mede no ayɛ adansedi ama nnipa no,wɔn kannifo ne ɔsahene.
55.5: Ampa ara mobɛfrɛ aman a munnim wɔn,na aman a munnim no bɛyɛ ntɛm aba mo nkyɛn,Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn nti,Israel Ɔkronkronni no,efisɛ wahyɛ mo anuonyam.”
55.6: Monhwehwɛ Awurade bere a mubehu no.Momfrɛ no bere a ɔbɛn.
55.7: Ma omumɔyɛfo ntwe ne ho mfi nʼakwan hona ɔbɔnefo nso mfi ne nsusuwii ho.Ma ɔnnan nkɔ Awurade nkyɛn, na obehu no mmɔbɔ,ɔnnan nkɔ yɛn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, na ɔde ne ho bɛkyɛ no.
55.8: “Na mʼadwene nyɛ mo adwene,na mo akwan nso nyɛ mʼakwan,”sɛnea Awurade se ni.
55.9: Sɛnea ɔsoro korɔn sen asase no,saa ara na mʼakwan korɔn sen mo akwanna mʼadwene nso korɔn sen mo adwene.
55.10: Sɛnea osu ne sukyerɛmmatɔ fi soro gu fam,na wɔnnsan nkɔ hɔ biowɔ bere a ɛmfɔw asasemma enguu nhwiren mpaee,sɛnea ɛbɛsow aba ama ogufo ne aduan ama odifo no,
55.11: saa ara na mʼasɛm a efi mʼanom no te:Ɛrensan mma me nkyɛn kwa.Mmom ɛbɛyɛ nea mepɛna awie botae a ɛno nti mesomaa no.
55.12: Mode ahosɛpɛw bepuena wɔagya mo kwan asomdwoe mu;mmepɔw ne nkokobetue nnwonto wɔ mo anim,na mfuw so nnua nyinaabɛbɔ wɔn nsam.
55.13: Nsɔe anan mu ɔpepaw befifi,na nnɛnkyɛnse anan mu ohuam dua befifi.Eyi bɛyɛ nea ɛhyɛ Awurade anuonyam,ɛbɛyɛ daapem nsɛnkyerɛnne,a ɛrentwa mu da.

56.1: Afoforo NkwagyeSɛɛ na Awurade se:“Monkɔ so mmu atɛntreneena monyɛ nea eye,efisɛ me nkwagye abɛnna ɛrenkyɛ me trenee bɛda adi.
56.2: Nhyira nka onipa a ɔyɛ eyi,onipa a okura mu dennen,nea ɔkae Homeda na ɔyɛ no kronkron,na ɔkame ne ho fi bɔneyɛ ho.”
56.3: Mma ɔnanani a ɔde ne ho ama Awurade nka se,“Ampa ara Awurade renkan me mfra ne nkurɔfo mu.”Na piamni biara nso nwiinwii sɛ,“Meyɛ duwui.”
56.4: Sɛɛ na Awurade se,“Piamfo a wɔkae me homenna,wɔn a wɔyɛ nea ɛsɔ mʼanina wokura mʼapam mu dennen,
56.5: mɛma wɔn, wɔ mʼasɔredan ne ho afasu nonkae ade ne din a,ɛkyɛn mmabarima ne mmabea;mɛma wɔn din a ɛbɛtena hɔ afebɔɔdin a ɛrentwa mu.
56.6: Na ananafo a wɔde wɔn ho bata Awurade hosɛ wɔbɛsom no,sɛ wɔbɛdɔ Awurade din,na wɔasɔre no,wɔn a wɔkae Homeda na wɔyɛ no kronkron nyinaana wokura mʼapam mu dennen,
56.7: eyinom na mede wɔn bɛba me bepɔw kronkron no sona mama wɔn anigye wɔ me mpaebɔfi.Wɔn ɔhyew afɔrebɔde ne afɔrebɔ ahorow nomegye wɔ mʼafɔremuka so;na wɔbɛfrɛ me fiaman nyinaa mpaebɔfi.”
56.8: Otumfo Awurade,nea ɔboaboa Israelfo a wɔatwa wɔn asu ano no ka se:“Mɛkɔ so aboaboa afoforo ano aka wɔn hoaka wɔn a maboa wɔn ano dedaw no ho.”
56.9: Onyankopɔn Sobo A Etia AmumɔyɛfoMommra, mo wuram mmoadoma nyinaa,mummedidi, mo kwae mu mmoa nyinaa!
56.10: Israel awɛmfo yɛ anifuraefo,wɔn mu biara nni nimdeɛ;wɔn nyinaa yɛ akraman mum,wontumi mmobɔ mu;wɔdeda hɔ na wɔsoso dae,nna yɛ wɔn dɛ.
56.11: Wɔyɛ akraman a wɔpɛ aduan yiye;wonnidi mmee da.Wɔyɛ nguanhwɛfo a wonni ntease;wɔn nyinaa fa wɔn kwan,obiara pɛ nʼankasa mfaso.
56.12: “Mommra,” obiara teɛ mu se, “momma me nsa!Momma yɛnnom bobesa mmow!Na ɔkyena bɛyɛ sɛ nnɛ,ebia ɛbɛsen nnɛ koraa.”

57.1: Atreneefo wu,na obiara nnwen ho wɔ ne koma mu;wɔfa nyamesurofo kɔ,na obiara nte asesɛ wɔfa atreneefo kɔsɛnea wobeyi wɔn afi bɔne mu.
57.2: Wɔn a wɔnantew tee nowɔhyɛn asomdwoe mu;wonya ahomegye bere a wɔadeda sɛ awufo.
57.3: “Nanso mo, mommra ha, mo ɔbayifo mma,mo nguaman ne mmea nguamanfo mma!
57.4: Hena na moreserew no?Hena na moredi ne ho fɛwna morebɔ no adapaa yi?Monnyɛ atuatewfo fekuwne atorofo asefo ana?
57.5: Mode ɔpɛ mmoroso bɔ afɔre wɔ adum mune dua biara a adennan ase;mode mo mma bɔ afɔre wɔ aku a mu dɔ mune abotan mpaapae ase.
57.6: Anyame a wɔyɛ abo trontrom, a ɛwɔ aku a mu dɔ mu no,wɔyɛ mo kyɛfa. Wɔn na mopɛ.Yiw, moahwie nsa afɔrebɔde agu wɔn sona mode aduan afɔrebɔde ama wɔn.Eyinom nyinaa akyi, mingow me nsam ana?
57.7: Moasiesie mo nnabea wɔ koko a ɛkorɔn so;ɛhɔ na mokɔ kɔbɔ afɔre.
57.8: Mo apon ne apongua akyina mo de mo abosonsom nsɛsode asisi.Mufii mʼakyi koyii mo mpa so ntama,mokɔdaa so na motrɛw mu;mo ne wɔn a modɔ wɔn mpa yɛɛ apam,na mohwɛɛ wɔn adagyaw mu.
57.9: Mode ngo kɔɔ Molek nkyɛnna momaa mo nnuhuam dɔɔso.Mosomaa mo ananmusifo kɔɔ akyirikyiri;mosian kɔɔ ɔda mu ankasa!
57.10: Mo nneyɛe maa mo ɔbrɛ,nanso moanka da se, ‘Yenni anidaso.’Mopɛɛ ahoɔden foforoenti moantɔ piti.
57.11: “Hena na wama mo koma atu na wabɔ mo hu sɛɛa enti moanni me nokware,na moankae meanaa moannwene eyi ho wɔ mo koma mu yi?So ɛnyɛ komm a mayɛ akyɛ no ntina munsuro me no ana?
57.12: Mɛda mo trenee ne mo nnwuma adi,na so remma mo mfaso.
57.13: Sɛ moteɛ mu pɛ mmoa a,momma mo ahoni a moaboa ano no nnye mo!Mframa bɛbɔ wɔn nyinaa akɔ,home kɛkɛ bɛfa wɔn.Nanso onipa a ɔde me yɛ ne guankɔbea nobedi asase no sona wafa me bepɔw kronkron no.”
57.14: Koma A Abubu No AwerɛkyekyeNa wɔbɛka se:“Monyɛ, monyɛ, munsiesie ɔkwan no!Munyiyi akwanside mfi me nkurɔfo akwan mu.”
57.15: Na oyi ne nea ɔkorɔn no,nea ɔte ase daa a ne din yɛ kronkron no se:“Mete beae a ɛkorɔn na ɛyɛ kronkron,mene nea ɔwɔ ahonu na ɔyɛ honhom mu hiani nso te,sɛ mɛkanyan honhom mu hiani no honhom,na makanyan ne koma a abubu no.
57.16: Meremmɔ sobo afebɔɔ,na me bo remfuw daa,sɛ anyɛ saa a onipa honhom bɛtɔ beraw wɔ mʼanim,onipa ahome a me na mabɔ no.
57.17: Ne nnebɔne adifudepɛ maa me bo fuwii;metwee nʼaso, na mede abufuw yii mʼani,nso ɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ nea ne koma pɛ.
57.18: Mahu ne nneyɛe, nanso mɛsa no yare.Mɛkyerɛ no kwan na makyekye ne werɛ,
57.19: na mama ayeyi aba wɔn a wɔredi awerɛhow wɔ Israel no ano.Asomdwoe, asomdwoe mmra wɔn a wɔwɔ akyirikyiri ne wɔn a wɔbɛn so,”sɛɛ na Awurade se. “Na mɛsa wɔn yare.”
57.20: Na amumɔyɛfo te sɛ po a ɛrehuru,entumi nyɛ komm,nʼasorɔkye yiyi dontori ne fi.
57.21: “Amumɔyɛfo nni asomdwoe.” Sɛɛ na me Nyankopɔn se.

58.1: Nokware Mmuadadi“Monteɛ mu dennen, monnnyae.Momma mo nne so sɛ torobɛnto.Mompae mu nka me nkurɔfo atuatew nkyerɛ wɔnna monka Yakobfi nso nnebɔne nkyerɛ no.
58.2: Da biara da wɔhwehwɛ me;ayɛ sɛ wɔpere sɛ wobehu mʼakwan,te sɛ wɔyɛ ɔman a wɔyɛ nea ɛteɛna wɔmpoo ne Nyankopɔn ahyɛde.Wobisa me hɔ gyinae a ɛteɛna ayɛ sɛ wɔpɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛn wɔn.
58.3: Wɔka se, ‘Adɛn nti na yɛadi mmuadana woanhu yi?Adɛn nti na yɛabrɛ yɛn ho ase,na woanhwɛ yi?’“Nanso mo mmuada da no, moyɛ nea mopɛna musisi mo adwumayɛfo nyinaa.
58.4: Ntɔkwaw ne akasakasa na mode wie mo mmuadadi,ne akuturuku a mode bobɔ mo ho.Morentumi nni mmuada sɛnea moyɛ no nnɛ yina moahwɛ anim sɛ wɔbɛte mo nne wɔ ɔsoro.
58.5: Eyi ne mmuadadi a mepɛ ana?Da koro pɛ a onipa de brɛ ne ho ase no ana?Ɛne sɛ obi si ne ti ase te sɛ mfeana ɔtena atweaatam so ne nsõ mu nko ara ana?Eyi na mofrɛ no mmuadadi,da a ɛsɔ Awurade ani yi ni ana?
58.6: “Saa mmuadadi yi na mepɛ:sɛ mubeyiyi ntɛnkyew nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔnna moasan konnua ahama,sɛ mubegyaa wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn sona moabubu konnua biara.
58.7: So ɛnsɛ sɛ mo ne wɔn a ɔkɔm de wɔn kyɛ mo aduanna moma ohiani a ɔnenam no baabi tena;na muhu nea ɔda adagyaw a mumfura no ntamana munnyi mo ani mfi mo ankasa mo nkurɔfo ne mo abusuafo so ana?
58.8: Ɛno na mo hann bepue te sɛ ahemadakye,na mo ayaresa aba ntɛm so;afei mo trenee bedi mo anim,na Awurade anuonyam bɛbɔ mo kyidɔm.
58.9: Afei mobɛfrɛ, na Awurade begye mo so;mobɛteɛ mu ahwehwɛ mmoa, na ɔbɛka se: Mini.“Sɛ muyi nhyɛso konnua,nsa a moteɛ wɔ nnipa so ne ntwatoso fi hɔ,
58.10: na sɛ mohaw mo ho ma wɔn a ɔkɔm de wɔnna moma wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so no nea ehia wɔn a,ɛno de, mo akanea bɛhyerɛn wɔ sum mu,na mo anadwo bɛyɛ sɛ owigyinae.
58.11: Awurade bɛkyerɛ mo kwan bere biara;ɔbɛma mo nea ehia mo wɔ asase wosee sona ɔbɛhyɛ mo nipadua den.Mobɛyɛ sɛ turo a wogugu so nsu yiye,sɛ asuwa a mu nsu nyow da.
58.12: Mo nkurɔfo bɛsan asi teteete nnwiriwii no,na wɔato fapem a akyɛ no;wɔbɛfrɛ mo Nea Osiesie Afasu a Abubu no,Nea Ogye Atenae Si Hɔ.
58.13: “Sɛ mohwɛ mo anammɔntu so yiye Homedana moanyɛ nea mopɛ wɔ me da kronkron no,sɛ mofrɛ Homeda no anigye dana mudi Awurade da kronkron no nina moamfa mo ara mo akwan sona moanyɛ nea mopɛ anaa moanka nsɛnhunu a,
58.14: ɛno de mubenya anigye wɔ Awurade muna mɛma mo anantew asase no sorɔnsorɔmmea sona moato pon wɔ mo agya Yakob agyapade so.”Awurade na waka.

59.1: Bɔne, Bɔneka Ne OgyeAmpa ara Awurade nsa nyɛ tiaa sɛ ɛrennye nkwa,na nʼasom nyɛ den sɛ ɛrente asɛm.
59.2: Nanso mo amumɔyɛ na atetewmo ne mo Nyankopɔn ntam;mo bɔne ama nʼanim ahintaw mo,a enti ɔrente.
59.3: Na mogya akeka mo nsa ho,afɔdi asra mo nsateaa ho.Mo ano akeka atosɛm,mo tɛkrɛma de amumɔyɛsɛm di nseku.
59.4: Obiara nhwehwɛ atɛntrenee;obiara mfa nokwaredi mmɔ ne nkurow.Wɔde wɔn ho to nsɛnhuhuw so na wotwa nkontompo;wonyinsɛn ɔhaw na wɔwo bɔne.
59.5: Wosow nhurutoa nkesuana wɔnwen ananse ntontan.Nea odi wɔn nkesua biara bewu,mu baako nso bɔ a, ɛpae ahurutoa.
59.6: Wɔn ntontan nye mma adurade;wɔrentumi mfa nea wɔyɛ nkata wɔn ho.Wɔn nneyɛe yɛ nneyɛe bɔne,na wodi akakabensɛm.
59.7: Wotu mmirika kɔyɛ bɔne;wɔnkyɛ opira ne awudi ho.Baabiara a wɔbɛkɔ no, wɔsɛe hɔ pasaa.
59.8: Asomdwoe kwan no, wonnim;atɛntrenee nni wɔn akwan so.Wɔadan wɔn akwan kɔntɔnkyeobiara a ɔnantew so no rennya asomdwoe.
59.9: Enti atɛntrenee ne yɛn ntam aware,na adetrenee mmɛn yɛn.Yɛhwehwɛ hann, nanso ne nyinaa yɛ sum;nea ɛhyerɛn, nanso yɛnam sum kabii mu.
59.10: Te sɛ anifuraefo no, yɛkeka wɔ afasu hohwehwɛ ɔkwan te sɛ nnipa a wonni ani.Owigyinae no yehintihintiw sɛnea onwini adwo;yedu ahoɔdenfo mu a yɛte sɛ awufo.
59.11: Yɛn nyinaa woro so te sɛ sisi;yɛde awerɛhow kurum sɛ mmorɔnoma.Yɛhwehwɛ atɛntrenee nso yenhu bi;ogye, nanso ɛwɔ akyirikyiri.
59.12: Efisɛ, yɛn mfomso adɔɔso wɔ wʼani so,na yɛn bɔne di adanse tia yɛn.Yɛn mfomso da yɛn anim daa,na yegye yɛn amumɔyɛ to mu:
59.13: atuatew ne nkontompo a etia Awurade,yɛn akyi a yɛdan kyerɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn,nhyɛso ne atuatew a yɛfoa so,atosɛm a efi koma mu a yɛka.
59.14: Enti wɔapam atɛntrenee kɔ nʼakyi,na adetrenee akogyina baabi;nokware ahwe ase wɔ mmɔnten sonokwaredi ntumi mma mu.
59.15: Nokware nni baabiara,obiara a ɔtwe ne ho fi bɔne ho no bɛyɛ ɔtamfo.Awurade hwɛe na ansɔ nʼanisɛ atɛntrenee nni hɔ.
59.16: Ohuu sɛ obiara nni hɔ,ɛyɛɛ no nwonwa sɛ obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɛpata;enti ɔno ankasa basa dii nkwagye ho dwuma maa no,na ne trenee wowaw no.
59.17: Ɔhyɛɛ trenee sɛ nkatabo,ne nkwagye dadekyɛw wɔ ne ti so.Ɔhyɛɛ aweretɔ ntadena ofuraa mmɔdemmɔ sɛ ntama.
59.18: Obegyina nea wɔayɛ soatua so kanʼatamfo benya nʼabufuwhyewwɔn a wɔne no ayɛ dɔm benya so akatua;nsupɔw no nso obetua wɔn ka sɛnea ɛfata wɔn.
59.19: Efi atɔe fam, nnipa besuro Awurade dinna efi apuei, wɔde nidi bɛma nʼanuonyam.Na ɔbɛba sɛ asu a ayiri tɛnnna Awurade ahomegu repia no.
59.20: “Ogyefo no bɛba Sion,na obeyi amumɔyɛsɛm nyinaa afi Yakob asefo mu,”sɛɛ na Awurade se.
59.21: “Me de, eyi yɛ me ne wɔn apam,” sɛnea Awurade se ni. “Me Honhom a ɔwɔ mo so, ne me nsɛm a mede ahyɛ mo anom, remfi mo anom, anaa mo mma, ne mo mma asefo anom, efi saa bere yi kosi daa apem,” sɛɛ na Awurade se.

60.1: Sion Anuonyam“Sɔre, hyerɛn, na wo hann aba,na Awurade anuonyam apue wo so.
60.2: Hwɛ, sum akata asase sona sum kabii akata aman no so,nanso Awurade apue wo sona nʼanuonyam ada adi wɔ wo so.
60.3: Amanaman bɛba wo hann no mu,na Ahemfo bɛba wo adekyee hann no mu.
60.4: “Ma wʼani so na hwɛ wo ho hyia:wɔn nyinaa aboa wɔn ho ano reba wo nkyɛn;wo mmabarima fifi akyirikyiri,na wokura wo mmabea wɔ abasa so.
60.5: Afei wobɛhwɛ na wʼanim atew,wo koma bɛbɔ na anigye ahyɛ no ma;ahonya a ɛwɔ po so, wɔde bɛbrɛ wo,na amanaman no ahode nso bɛba wo nkyɛn.
60.6: Yoma akuwakuw bɛyɛ wʼasase so ma,yomaforo a wufi Midian ne Efa.Na wɔn a wofi Seba nyinaa bɛba,wɔsoso sika kɔkɔɔ ne nnuhuamna wɔpae mu ka Awurade ayeyi.
60.7: Wɔbɛboaboa Kedar nguankuw nyinaa ano abrɛ wo,Nebaiot adwennini bɛsom wo;wobegye wɔn sɛ afɔrebɔde wɔ mʼafɔremuka so,na mɛhyɛ mʼasɔredan kronkron no anuonyam.
60.8: “Henanom ne eyinom a wotu sɛ omununkum,te sɛ mmorɔnoma a wɔrekɔ wɔn berebuw mu yi?
60.9: Ampa ara asupɔw no ani da me so;Tarsis ahyɛn na wodi anim,wɔde wo mmabarima fifi akyirikyiri reba,wɔsoso wɔn dwetɛ ne wɔn sikakɔkɔɔ,de rebɛhyɛ Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn anuonyam,Israel Kronkronni No,efisɛ wahyɛ wo anuonyam.
60.10: “Ananafo bɛto wʼafasu no bio,na wɔn ahemfo bɛsom wo.Ɛwɔ mu, mede abufuw asɛe wo de,nanso menam adom so behu wo mmɔbɔ.
60.11: Wo apon ano bɛdeda hɔ bere biara,wɔrentoto mu awia anaa anadwo,sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a nkurɔfo de amanaman no ahonya bɛbrɛ wo,wɔn ahemfo dii nkonimdi santen no anim.
60.12: Na ɔman anaa ahenni a wɔrensom wo no bɛyera,wɔbɛsɛe no pasaa.
60.13: “Lebanon anuonyam bɛba wo nkyɛn,ɔpepaw, ɔsɛsɛ ne kwabɔhɔre bɛbɔ mu,abesiesie me kronkronbea hɔ;na mɛhyɛ beae a me nan sisi no anuonyam.
60.14: Wo nhyɛsofo mmabarima bɛba abɛkotow wo;wɔn a wobu wo animtiaa nyinaa bɛkotow wʼanan asena wɔbɛfrɛ wo Awurade Kuropɔn,Israel Kronkronni, Sion.
60.15: “Ɛwɔ mu, wɔapa wʼakyi atan wo,a obiara ntu kwan mfa wo mu,nanso mɛyɛ wo ahohoahoade a ɛte hɔ daane awo ntoatoaso nyinaa anigyede.
60.16: Wobɛnom amanaman nufusu nona woanum adehye nufu.Afei wubehu sɛ me Awurade, me ne wo Agyenkwa,wo gyefo, Yakob Tumfo no.
60.17: Mede sikakɔkɔɔ besi kɔbere anan mu abrɛ wo,na dwetɛ asi dade anan mu.Mede kɔbere besi dua anan mu abrɛ wo,na dade asi abo anan mu.Mede asomdwoe bɛyɛ wo so amradona trenee ayɛ wo sodifo.
60.18: Wɔrente awurukasɛm wɔ wʼasase so bio,anaa nnwiriwii ne ɔsɛe wɔ wʼahye sommom wobɛfrɛ wʼafasu se Nkwagyene wʼapon se Ayeyi.
60.19: Owia renyɛ wo hann adekyee mu biona ɔsram hann renhyerɛn wo so,efisɛ Awurade bɛyɛ wo daapem hann,na wo Nyankopɔn bɛyɛ wo anuonyam.
60.20: Wo wia rentɔ bio,wo sram rennum bio,Awurade bɛyɛ wo daapem hann,na wʼawerɛhownna to betwa.
60.21: Na afei wo nkurɔfo nyinaa bɛyɛ atreneefona wɔbɛfa asase no adi so afebɔɔ.Wɔyɛ ade a madua na afefɛwme nsa ano adwuma aɛbɛda mʼanuonyam adi.
60.22: Mo mu akumaa koraa bɛdɔ ayɛ apem,na aketewa no ayɛ ɔman kɛse.Mene Awurade;na ne bere mu, mɛyɛ eyi ntɛm so.”

61.1: Awurade Adom AfeOtumfo Awurade Honhom wɔ me so,efisɛ, wɔafrɛ mesɛ memmɛka asɛmpa nkyerɛ ahiafo.Wasoma me se, menkɔkyekye wɔn a wɔn koma abubu werɛ,se mempae mu nka ahofadi nkyerɛ nnommumna wonyi nneduafo mfi sum mu,
61.2: se mempae mu nka Awurade adom no ho asɛm,ne yɛn Nyankopɔn aweretɔ da.Wasoma me se, menkyekye wɔn a wodi awerɛhow nyinaa werɛ,
61.3: na memma wɔn a wodi awerɛhow wɔ Sion no nea wohia,na menhyɛ wɔn ahenkyɛw fɛfɛnsi nsõ anan mu,anigye ngonsi awerɛhowdi anan mu,ayeyi atadensi abasamtu honhom anan mu.Wɔbɛfrɛ wɔn trenee adumnea Awurade aduade ada nʼanuonyam adi.
61.4: Wobesi tete mmubui no bio,na wɔasiesie mmeaemmeae a asɛe dedaada no;wɔbɛyɛ nkuropɔn a asɛe no foforonea asɛe awo ntoatoaso bebree no.
61.5: Ananafo bɛhwɛ mo nguankuw;ahɔho bɛyɛ adwuma wɔ mo mfuw ne bobeturo mu.
61.6: Na wɔbɛfrɛ mo Awurade asɔfo,wɔbɛto mo din sɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn asomfo.Amanaman no ahonya no na mubedina wɔn ahode na mode bɛhoahoa mo ho.
61.7: Wɔn animguase anan mume nkurɔfo benya anuonyam mmɔho,na ahohora anan muwɔbɛsɛpɛw wɔn ho wɔ wɔn adedi mu;ne saa nti wɔn asase no so kyɛfa bɛyɛ mmɔho,na anigye a enni awiei bɛyɛ wɔn dea.
61.8: “Na me Awurade, mepɛ atɛntrenee.Mikyi korɔn ne nnebɔne.Me nokware mu, mɛbɔ wɔn aba sona me ne wɔn ayɛ apam a ɛbɛtena hɔ daa.
61.9: Wɔn asefo begye din wɔ amanaman no mune wɔn mma wɔ nkurɔfo no mu.Wɔn a wohu wɔn nyinaa begye ato mu sɛwɔyɛ nnipa a Awurade ahyira wɔn.”
61.10: Awurade mu na me ho sɛpɛw me mmoroso,me Nyankopɔn mu na me kra di ahurusi.Efisɛ, ɔde nkwagye ntama afura mena ɔde trenee atade yuu awura me,sɛnea ayeforokunu siesie me ti so sɛ ɔsɔfo,ne sɛnea ayeforo de nnwinne hyehyɛ ne ho no.
61.11: Na sɛnea asase ma afifide puena turo nso ma aba nyin no,saa ara na Otumfo Awurade bɛma trenee ne ayeyiapue wɔ amanaman anim.

62.1: Sion Din FoforoSion nti, merenyɛ komm,Yerusalem nti, merenyɛ dinn,kosi sɛ ne trenee bɛhyerɛn sɛ adekyee,na ne nkwagye adɛw sɛ ogyatɛn.
62.2: Amanaman no behu wo trenee,na ahemfo nyinaa ahu wʼanuonyam;wɔbɛfrɛ wo din foforoa Awurade de bɛto wo no.
62.3: Wobɛyɛ anuonyam ahenkyɛw wɔ Awurade nsam,ne adehye anuonyam abotiri wɔ wo Nyankopɔn nsam.
62.4: Wɔremfrɛ wo amamfo bio,anaa wʼasase sɛ amamfo.Na mmom wɔbɛfrɛ wo Hefsiba anaa anisɔ Kuropɔnne wʼasase sɛ Beula anaa ɔwarefoefisɛ Awurade ani begye wo ho,na ɔbɛware wʼasase.
62.5: Sɛnea aberante ware ababaa no,saa ara na wo mmabarima bɛware wo;sɛ ayeforokunu ani gye nʼayeforo ho no,saa ara na wo Nyankopɔn ani begye wo ho.
62.6: Mede awɛmfo agyinagyina wʼafasu so, Yerusalem;wɔremmua wɔn ano awia anaa anadwo.Mo a musu frɛ Awurade no,monnhome koraa,
62.7: na mommma onnye nʼahome kosi sɛ, ɔbɛma Yerusalem atimna wayɛ no nea asase nyinaa bɛkamfo.
62.8: Awurade de ne basa nifa aka ntamne basa a ɛyɛ den no se,“Meremfa mo awimma mo atamfo sɛ wɔn aduan bio,na ananafo rennom nsa foforoa moabrɛ ho no bio;
62.9: wɔn a wotwa no na wobedina wɔakamfo Awurade,na wɔn a wɔboaboa bobe ano no bɛnomwɔ me kronkronbea adiwo.”
62.10: Momfa mu, momfa kuropɔn apon no mu!Munsiesie ɔkwan no mma nkurɔfo no.Mompae, mompae ɔtempɔn no!Munyiyi so abo no.Munsi frankaa mma amanaman no.
62.11: Awurade abɔ no dawuruakosi nsase ano se,“Monka nkyerɛ Ɔbabea Sion se,‘Hwɛ, wo Agyenkwa reba!Hwɛ nʼakatua ka ne ho,na nʼanamuhyɛde nso ka ne ho.’ ”
62.12: Wɔbɛfrɛ wɔn Nnipa Kronkron,wɔn a Awurade Agye Wɔn;na wɔbɛfrɛ wo Nea Wɔrehwehwɛ Nʼakyi Kwan,Kuropɔn a Ɛrenyɛ Amamfo Bio.

63.1: Onyankopɔn Aweretɔ Ne Ogye Da NoHena ne oyi a ofi Edom reba,nea ofi Bosra a nkekae kɔkɔɔ wɔ nʼatade mu yi?Hena ne oyi a wɔahyehyɛ no kɔsɔɔ yi,a ɔde nʼahoɔden kɛse retutu taataa yi?“Ɛyɛ me a, mekasa wɔ trenee mu,nea otumi gye nkwa no.”
63.2: Adɛn nti na mo ntade bere kɔɔ,te sɛ obi a ɔretiatia nsakyiamoa so de yi?
63.3: “Me nko ara atiatia nsakyiamoa so,na amanaman no mu obiara anka me ho.Mitiatia wɔn so wɔ mʼabufuw muna mimiaa wɔn so wɔ mʼabufuwhyew mu;wɔn mogya bɔ petee me ntade mu,maa nkekae yɛɛ mʼadurade nyinaa mu.
63.4: Na aweretɔda wɔ me koma muna me gye afe aba.
63.5: Mehwɛe, nanso na ɔboafo biara nni hɔ,ɛyɛɛ me ahodwiriw sɛ obiara anso me mu;enti mʼankasa abasa yɛɛ nkwagyedwuma maa me,na mʼabufuw wowaw me.
63.6: Mitiatiaa amanaman no so wɔ mʼabufuw mu;mema wɔbobowee wɔ mʼabufuwhyew muna mihwiee wɔn mogya guu fam.”
63.7: Ayeyi Ne MpaebɔMɛka Awurade ayamye ho asɛm,ne nneyɛe a enti ɔsɛ ayeyi,wɔ nea Awurade ayɛ ama yɛn nyinaa hoYiw, wɔ nneɛma pa bebree a wayɛama Israelfifo.Wɔ nʼayamhyehye ne ne mmɔborɔhunu a ɛdɔɔso no nti.
63.8: Ɔkae se, “Ampa ara wɔyɛ me nkurɔfo,mmabarima a wɔrenni me huammɔ;”ɛno nti ɔbɛyɛɛ wɔn Agyenkwa.
63.9: Wɔn amanehunu nyinaa mu, ɔno nso huu amane,na ɔbɔfo a ɔka ne ho no nso gyee wɔn.Ne dɔ ne ne mmɔborɔhunu mu, ogyee wɔn;ɔmaa wɔn so na ɔsoaa wɔnmfe a atwa mu no nyinaa mu.
63.10: Nanso wɔtew atuade how ne Honhom Kronkron werɛ.Enti ɔbɛyɛɛ wɔn tamfona ɔno ankasa ko tiaa wɔn.
63.11: Afei ne nkurɔfo kae tete nna no,Mose ne ne nkurɔfo nna no.Ɛhe na nea ɔde wɔn faa po mu no wɔ?Ɔne ne nguan no hwɛfo no?Ɛhe na nea ɔmaa ne Honhom Kronkron notenaa wɔn mu no wɔ,
63.12: nea ɔsomaa nʼanuonyam basa a ɛwɔ tumisɛ ommegyina Mose nsa nifa so no,nea ɔpaee asu no mu wɔ wɔn anim,de gyee din maa ne ho afebɔɔ no,
63.13: nea odii wɔn anim faa bun musɛnea ɔpɔnkɔ fa asase tamaa so,wɔanhintiw;
63.14: te sɛ anantwi a wɔkɔ sare so,Awurade Honhom ma wɔhomee.Sɛnea wokyerɛɛ wo nkurɔfo kwande gyee anuonyam abodin maa wo ho ni.
63.15: Brɛ wʼani ase hwɛ famfi wʼahengua a ɛkorɔn, ɛyɛ kronkron na ho wɔ nyam no so.Mo mmɔdemmɔ ne mo ahoɔden wɔ he?Wɔayi wʼayamhyehye ne wʼahummɔbɔ afi yɛn so.
63.16: Nanso wo ara wo ne yɛn Agyaɛwɔ mu, Abraham nnim yɛnna Israel nso nnye yɛn nto mu de;nanso wo, Awurade, wo ne yɛn Agya;efi tete, wo din ne; Yɛn Gyefo.
63.17: Adɛn, Awurade, na woma yɛkwati wʼakwanna wupirim yɛn koma enti ɛmma yenni wo ni?San bra, esiane wʼasomfo,mmusuakuw a wɔyɛ wʼagyapade no nti.
63.18: Bere tiaa bi mu wo nkurɔfo faa wo kronkronbeananso mprempren yɛn atamfo atiatia so.
63.19: Enti yɛyɛ wo de fi tete,nanso wɔn de, wunnii wɔn so henena wɔmmɔɔ wo din mfrɛɛ wɔn da.

64.1: Ao, sɛ anka wubesunsuane ɔsorosoro mu, asian aba fam a,ɛno na anka mmepɔw no ho bɛpopo wɔ wʼanim!
64.2: Sɛnea ogya ma mmabaa dɛwna ɛma nsu huru no,sian bra fam na ma wʼatamfo nhu wo din,na ma amanaman no ho mpopo wɔ wʼanim!
64.3: Na bere a woyɛɛ nneɛma a ɛyɛ nwonwa a yɛanhwɛ anim no,wusian baa fam na mmepɔw no ho popoo wɔ wʼanim.
64.4: Efi teteete obiara ntee,entwaa obiara aso mu,ani biara nhuu Onyankopɔn bi sɛ wo,nea odi dwuma ma wɔn a wɔtwɛn no no.
64.5: Woboa wɔn a wɔde anigye yɛ nea ɛteɛ,wɔn a wɔkae wʼakwan.Nanso yɛkɔɔ so yɛɛ bɔne tiaa wɔn no,wo bo fuwii.Na afei ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na woagye yɛn nkwa?
64.6: Yɛn nyinaa ayɛ sɛ obi a ne ho ntew,na yɛn trenee nneyɛe nyinaa te sɛ ntamagow fi;yɛn nyinaa akisa te sɛ ahaban,na yɛn bɔne pra yɛn kɔ te sɛ mframa.
64.7: Obiara mmɔ wo din,na obiara mpere sɛ obeso wo mu;efisɛ wode wʼanim ahintaw yɛnna yɛn bɔne nti woama yɛasɛe.
64.8: Nanso wo, Awurade, ne yɛn Agya.Yɛyɛ dɔte, na wo ne ɔnwemfo no;yɛn nyinaa yɛ wo nsa ano adwuma.
64.9: Mma wo bo mfuw ntra so, Awurade;nkae yɛn bɔne da biara da.Ao, brɛ wʼani ase hwɛ yɛn, yɛsrɛ wo,efisɛ yɛn nyinaa yɛ wo nkurɔfo.
64.10: Wo nkuropɔn kronkron no adan nweatam;Sion mpo ayɛ nweatam, Yerusalem ada mpan.
64.11: Yɛn asɔredan kronkron a ɛwɔ anuonyam, faako a yɛn nenanom yii wo ayɛ no,wɔde ogya ahyew,na nea ɛsom bo ma yɛn no, abubu.
64.12: Eyi nyinaa akyi, Awurade, wode wo ho bɛkame yɛn ana?Wobɛkɔ so ayɛ komm atwe yɛn aso aboro so ana?

65.1: Atemmu Ne Nkwagye“Medaa me ho adi kyerɛɛ wɔn a wɔammisa mʼase;wɔn a wɔnhwehwɛ me no huu me.Ɔman a wonsu mfrɛ me no,meka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, ‘Mini, Mini.’
65.2: Da mu nyinaa, matrɛw me nsa mu amannipa a wɔyɛ asoɔden ne nyiyiano,a wɔnenam akwammɔne so,na wodi wɔn ankasa nsusuwii akyi.
65.3: Nnipa a daa no woyi me ahiwɔ mʼanim pɛɛ,wɔbɔ afɔre wɔ nturo muna wɔhyew nnuhuam wɔ ntayaa afɔremuka so;
65.4: wɔn a wɔtenatena nna sona anadwo wosii pɛ kokoa mu;wɔwe mprakonamna wɔn nkutu mu wɔ nkwan a wɔde nam a ɛho ntew ayɛ;
65.5: wɔka se, ‘Mumfi ha; mommmɛn me,efisɛ me ho tew dodo ma mo!’Saa nnipa yi yɛ wusiw wɔ me hwenem,ogya a ɛkɔ so hyew da mu nyinaa.
65.6: “Hwɛ; wɔakyerɛw ato hɔ wɔ mʼanim se,merenyɛ komm, metua so ka pɛpɛɛpɛ;metua so ka agu wɔn asrɛ so,
65.7: mo ne mo agyanom bɔne nti,”sɛɛ na Awurade se.“Esiane sɛ wɔhyew afɔrebɔde wɔ mmepɔw sona wotwirii me wɔ nkoko so ntimesusuw bɔne a wɔyɛɛ kan no so akatua pɛpɛɛpɛagu wɔn asrɛ so.”
65.8: Sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Sɛnea wonya nsu fi bobe kasiaw mu,na nnipa ka se, ‘Monnsɛe no,efisɛ ade pa bi da so wɔ mu’ nosaa ara na mʼasomfo no nti mɛyɛ.Merensɛe wɔn nyinaa.
65.9: Mede Yakob asefo bɛba,na me mmepɔw no sodifo afi Yuda aba;me nkurɔfo a mapaw wɔn no bedi wɔn ade,na hɔ na mʼasomfo bɛtena.
65.10: Saron bɛyɛ nguankuw adidibea,na Akor bon no ayɛ anantwikuw homebeaama me nkurɔfo a wɔhwehwɛ me.
65.11: “Na mo a mo de mugyaw Awuradena mo werɛ fi ne bepɔw kronkron no,mo a moto pon ma Ahonyana mohyɛ afrasa wɔ nkuruwa mu ma Nkrabea no,
65.12: mede mo bɛto afoa ano,na mo nyinaa akotow ama wɔakum mo;efisɛ mefrɛe nanso moannye so,mekasae nanso moantie.Moyɛɛ nea ɛyɛ mʼani so bɔnena moyɛɛ nea mempɛ.”
65.13: Enti sɛɛ na Otumfo Awurade se:“Mʼasomfo bedidi,nanso ɔkɔm bɛde mo,mʼasomfo bɛnom,nanso osukɔm bɛde mo;mʼasomfo ani begye,nanso mo anim begu ase.
65.14: Mʼasomfo bɛto nnwomafi koma mu anigye muna mobɛteɛ mu asuafi mo koma ahoyeraw mu,na mubetwa adwo afi honhom a ayɛ mmrɛw mu.
65.15: Wubegyaw din bi a ɛbɛyɛ mmusuama wɔn a mapaw wɔn;Otumfo Awurade bekum wona nʼasomfo de, mɛma wɔn din foforo.
65.16: Obiara a ɔsrɛ nhyira wɔ asase no so no,bɛyɛ wɔ nokware Nyankopɔn koro no mu;obiara a ɔka ntam wɔ asase no sobɛka no wɔ nokware Nyankopɔn koro no mu.Na ɔhaw a atwa mu no wɔn werɛ befina wɔde behintaw me.
65.17: “Hwɛ! Mɛbɔɔsorosoro foforo ne asase foforo.Wɔrenkae nneɛma a atwam no bio,na ɛremma adwene mu nso.
65.18: Nanso momma mo ani nnye na munni ahurusi afebɔɔwɔ nea merebɛbɔ ho,efisɛ mɛbɔ Yerusalem ama ayɛ anigye,na mu nnipa ayɛ anigye farebae.
65.19: Mɛsɛpɛw me ho wɔ Yerusalem mu,na madi ahurusi wɔ me nkurɔfo ho.Na wɔrente agyaadwo ne osu nnyigyeiwɔ mu bio.
65.20: “Ɛrensi bio wɔ muabofra a ne nkwanna yɛ kakraa bi,anaa akwakoraa a onni ne mfe nwie;nea odi mfe ɔha na owu nowɔbɛfa no sɛ ɔbabun bi kɛkɛ;na nea wannya mfe ɔha nowɔbɛfa no sɛ wɔadome no.
65.21: Wobesisi afi na wɔatena mu,wɔbɛyɛ bobe nturo na wɔadi mu aba.
65.22: Wɔrensisi afi mma afoforo mmɛtena mu bio,na wɔrennua mma afoforo mmedi.Na nna a dua di no,saa ara na me nkurɔfo nna bɛyɛ;me nkurɔfo a mapaw wɔn no bediwɔn nsa ano adwuma so aba akyɛ.
65.23: Wɔremmrɛ nguna wɔrenwo mma a wɔn nkrabea nye;efisɛ wɔbɛyɛ nnipa a Awurade ahyira wɔn,wɔne wɔn asefo.
65.24: Mebua wɔn ansa, mpo, na wɔafrɛ me.Bere a wogu so rekasa no metie.
65.25: Pataku ne oguamma bedidi abɔ mugyata bɛwe sare sɛ nantwi,nanso mfutuma bɛyɛ ɔwɔ aduan.Wɔrempira obi anaa wɔrensɛe obiwɔ me bepɔw kronkron so nyinaa,”sɛnea Awurade se ni.

66.1: Atemmu Ne AnidasoSɛɛ na Awurade se:“Ɔsoro yɛ mʼahengua,na asase yɛ me nan ntiaso.Ofi a wubesi ama me no wɔ he?Ɛhe na ɛbɛyɛ me homebea?
66.2: Ɛnyɛ me nsa na ɛyɛɛ eyinom nyinaa,na ɛma ɛbae ana?”Awurade na ose.“Obi a mʼani sɔ no ni:nea ɔwɔ ahobrɛase ne ahonu honhom,na ne ho popo wɔ mʼasɛm ho.
66.3: Nanso obi a ɔde nantwinini bɔ afɔre nosaa onipa no ara kum nnipa,na nea ɔma oguamma no,saa onipa no ara bu ɔkraman kɔn mu;nea ɔbɔ aduan afɔre nosaa onipa no ara de prako mogya bɔ afɔre,nea ɔhyew nnuhuam a ɛwɔ din nosaa onipa no ara som ɔbosom.Wɔafa wɔn ankasa akwanna wɔn akra ani gye wɔn akyiwade ho;
66.4: enti me nso mɛpɛ ayayade ayɛ wɔnna mede nea wosuro bɛba wɔn so.Efisɛ mefrɛe no, obiara annye so,mekasae no, obiara antie.Wɔyɛɛ bɔne wɔ mʼani sona wɔyɛɛ nea mempɛ.”
66.5: Muntie Awurade asɛm,mo a mote nʼasɛm a mo ho popo:“Mo nuanom mmarima a wɔtan mo,na me din nti wotwa mo gyaw no, aka se,‘Momma wɔnhyɛ Awurade anuonyam,na yɛahu mo anigye!’Nanso wɔn anim begu ase.
66.6: Muntie huuyɛ a efi kuropɔn no mu,muntie gyegyeegye a efi asɔredan no mu!Ɛyɛ Awurade nnyigyeia ɔde retua nʼatamfo ka sɛnea ɛfata wɔn.
66.7: “Ansa na ɔbea bɛkyem no,ɔwo;ansa na ɔbɛte awoyaw noɔwo ɔbabarima.
66.8: Hena na wate biribi sɛɛ ho asɛm pɛn?Hena na wahu biribi sɛɛ pɛn?Wobetumi de da koro akyekyere ɔmansin,anaa ɔman mu, bere sin bi mu ana?Nanso awo ka Sion ara pɛ aɔwo ne mma.
66.9: Mede obi bedu awoko ano amemma no nwo ana?” Sɛnea Awurade se ni.“Misiw awotwaa anobere a awo adu so ana?” Wo Nyankopɔn na ose.
66.10: Mo ne Yerusalem ani nnye na munni ahurusi mma no,mo a modɔ no nyinaa;mo ne no nsɛpɛw mo ho yiye,mo a mudi ne ho awerɛhow nyinaa.
66.11: Mubenum nʼawerɛkyekye nufuno amee;mobɛnom aboro sona mo ani begye nea abu so atra so no ho.
66.12: Na sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Mede asomdwoe bɛma no sɛ asubɔnten,ne amanaman no ahonya nso sɛ asuten a ayiri.Mubenum na waturu mo wɔ ne basa sona obegyigye mo agoru wɔ nʼanankoroma so.
66.13: Sɛnea ɛna kyekye ne ba werɛ nosaa ara na mɛkyekye mo werɛ;na mubenya awerɛkyekye wɔ Yerusalem.”
66.14: Sɛ muhu eyi a, mo koma ani begyena mobɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm sɛ sare;wobehu Awurade nsa wɔ ne nkoa so,nanso wobehu nʼabufuwhyew wɔ nʼatamfo so.
66.15: Hwɛ, Awurade de ogya reba,na ne nteaseɛnam te sɛ mfɛtɛ;ɔde nʼabufuw bɛba wɔ anibere so,na ɔde gyaframa ayɛ nʼanimka.
66.16: Ogya ne nʼafoa,na Awurade de bebu nnipa nyinaa atɛn,na wɔn a wɔbɛtotɔ wɔ Awurade nsa ano bɛyɛ bebree.
66.17: “Wɔn a wɔtew wɔn ho na wodwira wɔn ho de kɔ nturo mu, na wodi ɔbaako a ɔfra wɔn a wɔwe mprakonam ne akisi ne nneɛma a ɛyɛ akyiwade akyi no, wɔbɛbɔ mu ahu wɔn awiei,” sɛnea Awurade se ni.
66.18: “Esiane wɔn nneyɛe ne wɔn nsusuwii nti, Me, mereba abɛboaboa amanaman ne ɔkasa ahorow ano, na wɔbɛba abehu mʼanuonyam.
66.19: “Na mɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne bi wɔ wɔn mu, na mede nkae no mu bi bɛkɔ amanaman no mu: Tarsis, Libiafo ne Lidiafo (wɔn a wɔagye din wɔ agyantow mu), Tubal ne Helafo, ne asupɔw a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri a wɔntee me din a ahyeta na wonhuu mʼanuonyam no. Wɔbɛpae mu aka mʼanuonyam wɔ amanaman mu.
66.20: Na wɔde mo nuabarimanom nyinaa befi amanaman nyinaa so bɛba me bepɔw kronkron a ɛwɔ Yerusalem no so sɛ, afɔrebɔde ama Awurade. Wɔtete apɔnkɔ so ne nteaseɛnam mu ne asako mu ne mfurumpɔnkɔ ne yoma so bɛba,” sɛɛ na Awurade se. “Wɔde wɔn bɛba sɛnea Israelfo de wɔn aduan afɔre kɔ Awurade asɔredan mu, wɔ afahyɛ nkuruwa a ho tew mu.
66.21: Na meyi wɔn mu bi ayɛ asɔfo ne Lewifo,” Awurade, na ose!
66.22: “Sɛnea ɔsorosoro foforo ne asase foforo bɛtena hɔ no, saa ara na mo din ne mo asefo bɛtena hɔ,” sɛnea Awurade se ni.
66.23: “Efi Ɔsram Foforo baako kɔpem foforo, efi Homeda baako kosi foforo no, adesamma nyinaa bɛba abɛkotow me,” sɛnea Awurade se ni.
66.24: “Na wobefi adi akohu wɔn a wɔtew atua tiaa me no afunu; wɔn asunson renwu, na wɔn gya nso rennum, na wɔn ho bɛyɛ adesamma nyinaa nwini.”
